70010000036249.intro: Classic adventure game set in a world, combining noir, Greek mythology, magic, mysticism, hopeless entourage of Greco-Roman Age of Decadence and everyday routine.
70010000036249.description:
Encourage yourself and step into darkness…
Enter Mariupolis, a dark place accompanied with confusing, strange music of no visible source. You are some sort of a detective, and therefore you need to investigate, but why? That’s the thing you’re going to find out… or, maybe not. Everything depends on you and sudden whims of Pentaculus, a grim god stretching its hands out over the whole city.
Investigate and solve puzzles, while resisting dark and obscure grasp of Mariupolis, where the only things guarding you from its baneful influence are sarcasm and arrogance. And be aware – your hero might actually die.

- Steal another’s property to find out the truth.
- Solve puzzles and conduct investigations.
- Reply in appropriate manner in dialogs to achieve your goals.
- Sometimes you’ll have to make a moral choice.
- Deceive and hide your true intensions.
- Complain about life, work and social order.

70010000036266.name: Ragdoll Fighter
70010000036266.description:
Ragdoll Fighter is a game where you need to test your battling skills against another ragdoll. Both you and the enemy have a blood bar and a specific blood count. You can use the joystick in order to control the character direction.
How to play:
You need to attack with your hands and feet, even use any weapons at your disposal in order to kill the enemy. When the health bar of your enemy reaches 0, you win. If your health bar reaches 0, then you will lose. 
Test out your skills and become the ultimate Ragdoll Fighter today!
Features:
Intense ragdoll fighting
Simple, beautiful graphics
Test and improve your skills
Easy to play, hard to master!

70010000036269.name: Landflix Odyssey
70010000036269.intro: Explore the worlds of your favorite TV shows, fight their famous villains and retrieve nuclear batteries to escape the Landflix Odyssey!
70010000036269.description:
Landflix Odyssey is an action platform in which players play as Larry, a lazy binge-watcher who finds himself trapped inside the streaming service after using special batteries. This incredible world is called Landflix!
In order to return home he has to recover all five batteries ended up inside the TV shows on the Landflix platform.

Landflix Odyssey is a clear reference to video-on-demand platforms and TV shows universe.
In each TV show our hero can count on some special powers that will help him overcome obstacles and dangers in any game world.
Our hero can move through parallel dimensions, use magic swords, do superhero stuff with superhero tools, take drugs to increase productivity and defend himself with a crossbow against hordes of zombies.

70010000036366.name: Air Bounce - The Jump 'n' Run Challenge
70010000036366.description:
Jump or Die!
AIR BOUNCE - THE JUMP 'N' RUN CHALLENGE is a fast-paced crazy difficult sometimes rage-inducing 3d first-person platformer. Are you ready for the challenge?

70010000036402.name: Fire & Water
70010000036402.description:
Fire & Water is a game where you use the power of fire and water in order to solve various puzzles. Both Water Girl and Fire boy are working together to solve a vast range of different, exciting puzzles all the time. Controlling the two characters is very simple, and you must help Fire boy avoid water, while Water girl needs to avoid fire.
There’s also black water that can kill both of them. You will need to use mirrors, elevators, wind machines, pulleys, black balls and a variety of other tools in order to complete these tasks. The faster you do that, the better it will be. 
Features:
Impressive puzzle gameplay
More than 30 maps to play through
Use pulleys, wind machines and elevators
Escape the maze and win

70010000036410.name: Smart Moves
70010000036410.intro: Combination of puzzle and turn-based roguelike mechanics. Destroy monsters, open chests! Smart moves are the key to survival!
70010000036410.description:
Different worlds with levels of increasing difficulty, sneaky monsters, unexpected obstacles and great treasures await you!

The hero can attack monsters when hero and monster are standing on neighboring square. Avoid being the first at a distance of impact! The hero can't skip turns, but can use level objects - or other monsters - to “skip” the turn.

Every game level is a puzzle with its own logical solution. Our experiments with game mechanics require a good understanding from the player how objects interact with each other in the game world.

The game has original game art style. You get a new playing experience where game mechanics are of maximum importance.

70010000036469.name: Arcade Archives MARKHAM
70010000036469.intro: Your mission is to destroy Antarctic Bases. Go and bring peace to the world!
70010000036469.description:
"MARKHAM" is a scrolling shooter game released by SUNSOFT in 1983.
Use a Beam Gun and powerful Missiles to attack and destroy Antarctic Bases. 
Aiming each attack type takes some getting used to, but once you do, taking out enemies feels great!

The "Arcade Archives" series has faithfully reproduced many classic Arcade masterpieces.
Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores.
Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

*This game uses the Japanese ROM for the main part of the game.
The options menu and manual are available in Japanese, English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish.

70010000036644.name: Kingdom Tales
70010000036644.intro: How glorious your kingdom can be?
70010000036644.description:
An ancient prophecy proclaims: "One day, the mighty dragons will seek new territory to claim as their own! The day has come! The prophecy has been fulfilled!" 

Now, only the most courageous and just of leaders will be able forge a friendship between mankind and dragons! Step into the role of the steadfast and altruistic leader who's quests is to ensure the safety and prosperity of all people and creatures in the kingdom!

In Kingdom Tales you will explore the land, gather, produce and trade resources, build and repair subjects homes and community structures, and work to increase your subjects level of happiness! 

Along your journey, you will meet druids, forest fairies, trolls, dragons and other exciting creatures while racing against the clock to complete tasks in this gorgeous and fun time management / strategy game!

- Explore 45 extraordinary levels
- Ensure the welfare of your subjects
- Earn different achievements
- Assist Kingdom inhabitants in the rebuilding of their community
- Dive into the highly detailed animated environments

70010000036956.name: Wrestling Empire
70010000036956.intro: The lightweight champion of wrestling brings the revolution to Nintendo Switch™!
70010000036956.description:
Recalling the genre's 64-bit heyday, this is wrestling that puts the fun first - filling the ring with as many wrestlers as you can handle and letting them loose with freestyle animation where anything could happen at any moment. Design matches before your very eyes with the intuitive setup process, and tag in up to 4 controllers at ANY time for old school multiplayer!

Or create your own star and embark on a career to encounter up to 350 opponents across 10 different rosters in an endless schedule of possibilities. Make the right moves backstage as well as in the ring to fight for your worth and retire with a career worth remembering. Just when you think you've seen it all, you can even save your changes to each character to make the world your own and never get bored of wrestling again!

•	Epic universe of 350 characters across 10 different rosters - and up to 30 of them in the ring loaded instantly!
•	Gaming's most engrossing simulation of life as a wrestler - from contract negotiations to weekly news reports.
•	Door-to-door interactivity trusts you to make your own entrance AND walk back through the curtain.
•	Unique animation system allows any move to transition into any other at any moment for mind-blowing spots that you'll want to catch on camera!
•	Enjoy the action from different camera angles to suit any playing style.
•	Interactive tutorial makes wrestling easy to play yet satisfying to master.
•	Design matches & arenas before your very eyes with the most intuitive setup process in wrestling.
•	Tag in up to 4 friends at ANY time for old school multiplayer on the same screen.
•	Own once and forever with no micro-transactions or added costs - even as the concept continues to evolve.

70030000010781.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III Demo

70030000011910.name: Spiral Memoria -The Summer I Meet Myself- Demo

70030000012255.name: KINGDOM HEARTS Melody of Memory DEMO Version

70030000012275.name: FINAL FANTASY® CRYSTAL CHRONICLES™ Remastered Edition Lite

70030000012457.name: When the Past was Around Demo

70030000012507.name: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity Demo

70050000012254.name: Dead by Daylight: DESCEND BEYOND
70050000012254.description:
Descend Beyond is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Blight, and a Survivor, Felix Richter. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the survivor:  Felix's The World Class jacket.

The Blight, a bright and ambitious chemist who sought to enhance humanity through the use of his compounds, only to become a victim of his own ambitions, is the new Killer. After his research was stolen, The Blight was lured into the Realm of the Entity by the promise of new, forbidden knowledge. The new survivor is Felix Richter, an eccentric architect with a unique vision. Returning to the mysterious island where his father had disappeared, Felix descended into the darkness beyond and was never seen again.

70050000012258.name: Dead by Daylight: A Nightmare on Elm Street™
70050000012258.description:
Who would have thought that dreams could actually do harm? Physical, pain inducing harm? Fear and pain stemming from a scarred soul who seeks revenge for a punishment he deserved. Freddy Krueger will always be remembered - whether you are awake or asleep.

A Nightmare on Elm Street is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, a Survivor and a Map.

70050000016803.name: Minecraft Dungeons: Jungle Awakens
70050000016803.description:
A source of unbelievable power has crash-landed among the twisting vines of a distant,
dangerous jungle. This mysterious power has spread its influence through vile vines, and now
new terrors bloom – such as the Leapleaf and Whisperer. Trek through three new missions that
will take you to the heart of the jungle where you’ll find new weapons, armour, and artifacts. This
journey is meant for the bravest of heroes, for all twisted vines and paths lead to the source of
corruption: the Jungle Abomination. This beast must be dealt with to restore balance to the
jungle, so strike true and move swiftly.
FEATURES
- Fight through 3 new missions.
- Battle the Leapleaf and Whisperer.
- Take on the Jungle Abomination.
- New weapons, armour, and artifacts.

70050000016804.name: Minecraft Dungeons: Creeping Winter
70050000016804.description:
"A creeping winter is slowly taking over everything it touches, and the source of its chilling power
is a powerful creature known as the Wretched Wraith. To stop the never-ending winter in its icy
tracks, a noble hero must take on new missions in the lands trapped below zero. It won’t just be
wintry winds that seek to throw the hero from their path to destroy the Wretched Wraith, but new
enemies such as the Illusioner and Iceologer will join the brawl! As you hunt down the source of
corruption, you’ll discover new armour, weapons, and artifacts below the snow and sleet. Stay
cool and keep a steady hand, for the frost is unforgiving."

70050000017116.name: Italian Language Pack
70050000017116.description: Adds Italian as a selectable language in game.

70050000017118.name: Spanish Language Pack
70050000017118.description: Adds Spanish as a selectable language in game.

70050000017985.name: Mega Man Zero/ZX Reploid Remixes
70050000017985.description: In addition to six alternative in-game music tracks, this pack adds four special arranged tracks by series veteran composers to the Music Player.

70050000018158.name: Small Puzzles 7
70050000018158.description: An additional pack of 30 new puzzles in smaller sizes.

70050000018159.name: Small Puzzles 8
70050000018159.description: An additional pack of 30 new puzzles in smaller sizes.

70050000018160.description: An additional pack of 30 new puzzles in smaller sizes.

70050000018162.description: An additional pack of 30 new puzzles in smaller sizes.

70050000018170.description: An additional pack of 30 new puzzles in larger sizes.

70050000018173.description: An additional pack of 30 new puzzles in larger sizes.

70050000018174.name: Large Puzzles 11
70050000018174.description: An additional pack of 30 new puzzles in larger sizes.

70050000018689.name: DRAGON BALL FIGHTERZ - Master Roshi
70050000018689.description:
The founding father of the Turtle School, Master Roshi now comes to DRAGON BALL FighterZ!

This content includes:
• Master Roshi as a new playable character
• 5 alternative colors for his outfit
• Master Roshi Lobby Avatar
• Master Roshi Z Stamp

70050000018690.name: DRAGON BALL FIGHTERZ - FighterZ Pass 3 DLC 4
70050000018690.description: Get access to this additional character.

70050000018691.name: DRAGON BALL FIGHTERZ - FighterZ Pass 3 DLC 5
70050000018691.description: Get access to this additional character.

70050000018765.name: The Crown Tundra
70050000018765.description:
Pokémon Sword: The Crown Tundra

The Crown Tundra contains the following:
1. New areas (The Crown Tundra)
2. New Pokémon
3. New characters
4. A new form of co-op play
5. A wide range of clothing items
6. The Galarian Star Tournament

1. New areas
Your journey takes you to the Crown Tundra, where the falling snow carpets the land in silver-white. In this realm of extreme cold and towering snowy peaks, small communities endure by clinging together. Lead an expedition across these snow-swept plains, delve into Pokémon Dens only ever glimpsed in Max Raid Battles, and more!

2. New Pokémon
Legendary Pokémon never before seen in Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield make an appearance, including Calyrex, Regieleki, Regidrago, Galarian Articuno, Galarian Zapdos and Galarian Moltres. The Crown Tundra is host to many Pokémon, both regional forms with a special appearance unique to Galar as well as Pokémon known from other regions.

3. New characters
Upon arriving you'll encounter Peony, who came to the Crown Tundra to verify the rumours of Legendary Pokémon he's heard and tasks you with leading the expedition. Many more unique and colourful characters await!

4. A new form co-op play
Features a new gameplay mode called a Dynamax Adventure that enables you to explore Pokémon Dens in the Crown Tundra with other players. Legendary Pokémon featured in past Pokémon titles are lurking in the shadows deep within, so it's time to team up with your friends and get exploring!

5. A wide range of clothing items
You can enjoy an expanded selection of clothing items to brighten up your adventure, with more than 100 new items available across The Isle of Armor and The Crown Tundra.

6. The Galarian Star Tournament
Here you can have fun battling with or against Trainers who've appeared in Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield.

Note: For more details about the DLC, check out the official Expansion Pass site.

70050000018767.name: The Crown Tundra
70050000018767.description:
Pokémon Shield: The Crown Tundra

The Crown Tundra contains the following:
1. New areas (The Crown Tundra)
2. New Pokémon
3. New characters
4. A new form of co-op play
5. A wide range of clothing items
6. The Galarian Star Tournament

1. New areas
Your journey takes you to the Crown Tundra, where the falling snow carpets the land in silver-white. In this realm of extreme cold and towering snowy peaks, small communities endure by clinging together. Lead an expedition across these snow-swept plains, delve into Pokémon Dens only ever glimpsed in Max Raid Battles, and more!

2. New Pokémon
Legendary Pokémon never before seen in Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield make an appearance, including Calyrex, Regieleki, Regidrago, Galarian Articuno, Galarian Zapdos and Galarian Moltres. The Crown Tundra is host to many Pokémon, both regional forms with a special appearance unique to Galar as well as Pokémon known from other regions.

3. New characters
Upon arriving you'll encounter Peony, who came to the Crown Tundra to verify the rumours of Legendary Pokémon he's heard and tasks you with leading the expedition. Many more unique and colourful characters await!

4. A new form co-op play
Features a new gameplay mode called a Dynamax Adventure that enables you to explore Pokémon Dens in the Crown Tundra with other players. Legendary Pokémon featured in past Pokémon titles are lurking in the shadows deep within, so it's time to team up with your friends and get exploring!

5. A wide range of clothing items
You can enjoy an expanded selection of clothing items to brighten up your adventure, with more than 100 new items available across The Isle of Armor and The Crown Tundra.

6. The Galarian Star Tournament
Here you can have fun battling with or against Trainers who've appeared in Pokémon Sword and Pokémon Shield.

Note: For more details about the DLC, check out the official Expansion Pass site.

70050000018769.name: Robert James - Jungle Fury Ranger Character Unlock
70050000018769.description: This unlocks Robert James - Jungle Fury Ranger, a full character, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

70050000018807.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Camouflage Rifles Skin Pack
70050000018807.description:
In a sharpshooting duel to the death, any advantage could make the difference between victory and defeat.
 Apply highly detailed camouflage wraps to your rifles, breaking up their silhouette and blending them into the lush combat environments of WW2 Italy. Weapon skins can be used to customise all seven of Sniper Elite 4’s starting rifles for use in any singleplayer, co-op or multiplayer mode.

70050000018810.name: Lauren Shiba - Super Samurai Ranger Unlock
70050000018810.description: This unlocks Lauren Shiba - Super Samurai Ranger, a full character, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

70050000018813.name: Scorpina - MMPR Villain Character Unlock
70050000018813.description: This unlocks Scorpina - MMPR Villain Character Unlock for Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

70050000018815.name: Dai Shi - Phantom Beast King Skin
70050000018815.description: This unlocks Dai Shi - Pharntom Beast King Skin, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

70050000018887.name: 15x15 Pieces Pack 18
70050000018887.description: Another 48 puzzle grids to solve at 15x15, which will form two more spectacular pictures.

70050000018893.name: 20X20 Pieces Pack 18
70050000018893.description: Another 48 puzzle grids to solve at 20x20, which will form two more spectacular pictures.

70050000018942.name: Summer Outfit Set(Common)
70050000018942.description:
Contents:
 - Summer Outfit: Common "A cool and fashionable summer outfit tailored from light materials."
 - Summer Kid: Common "A cool and fashionable summer outfit tailored from light materials."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
 - Fashion-Statement Straw Hat "A straw hat accessory fashionably worn on the back rather than on the head."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.

70050000018943.name: Summer Outfit Set(Clean-Cut)
70050000018943.description:
Contents:
 - Summer Outfit: Clean-Cut "A cool and fashionable summer outfit tailored from light materials."
 - Summer Kid: Clean-Cut "A cool and fashionable summer outfit tailored from light materials."
You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
 - Canteen "A metal canteen with a leather belt holder."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.

70050000018944.name: Summer Outfit Set(Yano Market)
70050000018944.description:
Contents:
 - Summer Outfit: Yano Market "A cool and fashionable summer outfit tailored from light materials."
 - Summer Kid: Yano Market "A cool and fashionable summer outfit tailored from light materials."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
 - Rattan Canteen "A glass canteen surrounded in woven cane."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.

70050000018945.name: Knapsack Set
70050000018945.description:
Contents:
 - Explorer's Knapsack "A high-capacity rucksack capable of withstanding the rigors of a long journey."
 - Adventurer's Knapsack "A tough rucksack that can also be used for adventuring."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Fashion Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.

70050000018967.name: Min Min Challenger Pack
70050000018967.description:
From ARMS, the Ramen Bomber Min Min is now available! She switches between three stretchy, long-reaching ARMS to fight.

Her stage is "Spring Stadium" - use its jumping platforms and item-dropping drones to get the edge in battle! 

The music includes original stage themes and a remix of the official theme song! Maybe you'll discover some favourites!

Includes:
・ Fighter: Min Min
・ Stage: Spring Stadium
・ Music: 18 tracks (*1)
・ Smash tag icons: 3
・ Spirits: Min Min (Fighter) (*2)
・ Spirit Board additions: Other spirits from ARMS that were added in Ver. 8.0.0. (*3) (*4)

*1 Can be found in Vault → Sounds after purchase.
*2 Can be collected via Classic Mode or the Shop on the Vault menu after purchase.
*3 These new spirits are also available free of charge from Vault → Shop.
*4 Check the "Software update available: Ver. 8.0.0" news update for details on the new spirits.

70050000018968.name: Steve & Alex Challenger Pack
70050000018968.description:
Steve and Alex from the Minecraft series are joining the battle! You can also choose to look like a Zombie or Enderman when selecting your fighter. Set out for adventure on the new stage, Minecraft World; dig for materials, craft items, and even place blocks!

Travel to six different biomes in Minecraft World, including the plains and the snowy tundra. There are also seven music tracks, mainly consisting of arrangements. Mine, craft, and battle it out!

Includes:
・ Fighter: Steve/Alex/Zombie/Enderman
・ Stage: Minecraft World
・ Music: 7 tracks (*1)
・ Smash tag icons: 5
・ Spirits: Steve, Alex (*2)
・ Spirit Board additions: Other spirits from Minecraft that were added in Ver. 9.0.0. (*3) (*4)

*1 Can be found in Vault → Sounds after purchase.
*2 Can be collected via Classic Mode or the Shop on the Vault menu after purchase.
*3 These new spirits are also available free of charge from Vault → Shop.
*4 Check the "Software update available: Ver. 9.0.0" news update for details on the new spirits.

70050000019163.name: Pinball FX3 - Williams™ Pinball: Volume 6
70050000019163.description:
This stunning collection of three authentic Williams™ and Bally™ tables includes FUNHOUSE™, SPACE STATION™, and DR. DUDE AND HIS EXCELLENT RAY™. All available to play both in their classic original form and as remastered tables with updated graphics, animated toys, and a host of new features.

- FUNHOUSE: Starring Rudy, pinball's most iconic ventriloquist dummy antagonist! Don't let his relentless taunting get to you.
- SPACE STATION: Prepare for liftoff. We have ignition. It's time to launch this classic.
- DR. DUDE AND HIS EXCELLENT RAY: Drop in to Dr. Dude's Kinetic Clinic! Get hip! Earn respect! Be the envy of your friends! Advance the DUDE-O-METER from Plain Dude to Super Dude for the ultimate dude-o-riffic reward. Way cool pinball has finally arrived!

70050000019184.name: MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2 DLC Pack 2: Mei Hatsume
70050000019184.description:
Play as Mei Hatsume in MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2!
This pack also includes 10 color variations for Mei Hatsume's costume.

Contents:
- Playable Character Mei Hatsume
- 10 Costume Color Variations

70050000019187.name: MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2 DLC Pack 3: Itsuka Kendo
70050000019187.description:
Play as Itsuka Kendo in MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2!
This pack also includes 10 color variations for Itsuka Kendo's costume.

Contents:
- Playable Character Itsuka Kendo
- 10 Costume Color Variations

70050000019270.name: Fantasy Strike Core Pack
70050000019270.intro: David Sirlin's Reboot of the Fighting Game Genre
70050000019270.description: Get the most out of Fantasy Strike, the vibrant fantasy fighting game. The Core Pack gives you access to several game modes: Arcade mode, Versus mode for local play (including standard and team battle), Survival modes (including 4 sub-modes), and the over-the-top Boss Rush mode where you assemble a deck of powerups against increasingly crazy CPU characters. The Core Pack also lets you send and receive direct challenges from friends in both standard and team battle modes.

70050000019272.name: Fantasy Strike Collector's Pack
70050000019272.intro: David Sirlin's Reboot of the Fighting Game Genre
70050000019272.description:
Fantasy Strike is a vibrant fantasy fighting game. This Collector's Pack gives you the ultimate in Fantasy Strike experience. Get everything in the Core Pack PLUS 13,500 gems, one year of Fantasy+ membership, the High Roller costume for Lum the Gambling Panda, and the exclusive "Party Time" KO effect.

In addition, the Core Pack (included in this bundle) gives you access to several game modes: Arcade mode, Versus mode for local play (including standard and team battle), Survival modes (including 4 sub-modes), and the over-the-top Boss Rush mode where you assemble a deck of powerups against increasingly crazy CPU characters. The Core Pack also lets you send and receive direct challenges from friends in both standard and team battle modes.

70050000019385.name: ONE PIECE: PIRATE WARRIORS 4 Whole Cake Island Pack
70050000019385.description:
Get three new playable characters in this Character Pack!

Jump into the fray and enjoy all-new ONE PIECE: PIRATE WARRIORS action with three characters from the Whole Cake Island Arc!

Additional Playable Characters:
- Charlotte Smoothie
- Charlotte Cracker
- Vinsmoke Judge

70050000019386.name: ONE PIECE: PIRATE WARRIORS 4 The Worst Generation Pack
70050000019386.description:
Get three new playable characters in this Character Pack!

Jump into the fray and enjoy all-new ONE PIECE: PIRATE WARRIORS action with three of Luffy's rivals from the "Worst Generation"!

Additional Playable Characters:
- X Drake
- Killer
- Urouge

70050000019387.name: ONE PIECE: PIRATE WARRIORS 4 Character Pass DLC 3
70050000019387.description: Get access to this additionnal content.

70050000019481.name: Children of Morta: Paws and Claws
70050000019481.description:
Notice: 100% of 11 bit studios and Dead Mage's proceeds go to the Humane Society International charity!

Hunters of the night, creatures of the day. They howl, growl, hiss and grumble - but more than anything, they feel and think in a similar way that we all do. And their lives are as precious as ours. This DLC adds new features to the game - like the Animal Shelter System, new boosts, animations and events - but it actually does far more than that. It directly helps the animals in need - not those virtual, but the real ones. 100% of 11 bit studios and Dead Mage proceeds from Paws and Claws DLC go to the Humane Society International charity, whose main mission is to help animals all over the world. You can read more about HSI here: https://www.hsi.org/

And if you're willing to donate even more to the cause, visit the HSI donations page here: 

https://donate.hsi.org/page/23410/donate

Paws and Claws DLC - key new features:

- Animal Shelter System - which adds a whole new section of the house!
- A herd of varied animals visited the family’s house: Deer, fox, birds and more.
- New mechanic: use treats to feed animals and look after them.
- New special animal-related boosts (XP Gain, Movement Speed and more) available for the Bergsons.
- New Home Interactive Events
- More than 100 new animations, big and small, showing you the life of your new animal friends!

70050000019578.name: Trails of Cold Steel III: Self-Assertion Panels
70050000019578.description:
Equippable messages that appear above playable characters' heads. You can choose from 10 different messages. 
 Headpats! x 10

 Oh, Rean... x 10

An equippable set of Raccoon ears and tail. Super charming!

Raccoon Set x 10

*These items can be obtained from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.

70050000019584.name: Trails of Cold Steel III: Rainbow Hair Set
70050000019584.description:
A set of hair dye that allows you to change the hair color of Rean and the branch campus students. Its dazzling style will blind you with charm. 

Rainbow Hair - Rean x 1
Rainbow Hair - Juna x 1
Rainbow Hair - Kurt x 1
Rainbow Hair - Altina x 1

70050000019585.name: Trails of Cold Steel III: Angel Set
70050000019585.description:
An equippable set of angel wings and a halo. Simply divine!

Angel Set x 10

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.

70050000019586.name: Trails of Cold Steel III: Devil Set
70050000019586.description:
An equippable set of demon wings and horns. Delightfully devilish!

Devil Set x 10

*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.

70050000019587.name: Trails of Cold Steel III: Ashen Knight Set
70050000019587.description:
An equippable set of Valimar's horn, wings, and waist armor. I hope senpai acknowledges me!

70050000019634.name: Trails of Cold Steel III: Japanese Voice Pack
70050000019634.description: This will add the option for Japanese voices.

70050000019713.name: Summer Heat Skin Pack
70050000019713.description:
Heat up the arena with three new character skins. The Summer Heat Skin Pack includes Endless Summer Kitana, Fireworks Erron Black, and Off The Bone Baraka.

The Summer Heat Skin Pack is included as part of MK11: Aftermath only. Not for individual sale.

70050000020053.name: Cow Costume
70050000020053.description:
Dress up as a bovine beau or belle with the Cow Costume for STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town. You'll mooove the townsfolk with your fashion sense!

To use this item in-game, examine the Mirror in your house to change your outfit.

70050000020081.name: Chicken Costume
70050000020081.description:
Add some poultry pizzazz to your wardrobe with the Chicken Costume for STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town. Folks will think you're clucky to have it!

To use this item in-game, examine the Mirror in your house to change your outfit.

70050000020082.name: Dog Costume
70050000020082.description:
Dress up like a cute li'l pupper with this Dog Costume for STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town. You'll be doggone surprised by how fetching you look!

To use this item in-game, examine the Mirror in your house to change your outfit.

70050000020083.name: Chick Costume
70050000020083.description:
Impress the chicks (and the ladies) with this vibrant Chick Costume for STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town. High fashion isn't normally so cheep!

To use this item in-game, examine the Mirror in your house to change your outfit.

70050000020084.name: Sheep Costume
70050000020084.description:
Don't be baaashful, pull the wool over yourself with this Sheep Costume for STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town. Start living your fluffiest life!

To use this item in-game, examine the Mirror in your house to change your outfit.

70050000020201.name: TerraTech - Weapons of War Pack
70050000020201.description: Send Hawkeye back in time with the 1940's-inspired Iron Hunter, and take to the skies with Venture as you design your very own Warbird, with this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins.

70050000020241.name: TerraTech - To the Stars Pack
70050000020241.description: Relive Roswell with Better Future and enter the Space Race as GSO, with this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins.

70050000020244.name: TerraTech - R&D Pack
70050000020244.description:
R&D Labs is a game mode for TerraTech, which allows the player to take on a variety of unique challenges and test out a series of experimental items.

The Labs include all items from the main game, unlocked for unlimited building, and are split into a number of different features, including:

- Battle Arena, Target Practice & Turret Run
- Races, Time Trials & Stunt Ramps
- DPS Target, Weigh Station & Speed Trap
- Grassland, Desert, Mountain and Exotic Biome Zones

70050000020268.name: Path of the Crow
70050000020268.description:
The Crow DLC contains: The Crow familiar, a friend to our hero. The crow will stay by your side through the darkest of paths. 

A new level, The Battlefield. Dilapidated and riven with rot and decay, the land here has been shattered and burned by explosions, with a fog-filled with the calls to charge. This level is the epitome of all war and it is yours to battle through. 

A new enemy, The Captain, a truly frightening opponent, maddened by his lust for war. He is armed with a cannon and a sabre, this menace is trouble close or afar.

A new weapon, The Mortar, claimed from The Battlefield, this new weapon will terrify even those cowering behind cover.

A new blessing, Strength, with this, you'll be able to punch down steel doors and land a mean hook on the denizens in your way.

70050000020350.name: Hidden Through Time - Viking Tales
70050000020350.intro: The Viking Tales DLC adds 10 levels to the campaign and 400 viking themed objects for level creators to make amazing levels with!
70050000020350.description:
Join Clicky in his longship and sail to Scandinavia to discover whether the tales told about vikings are true!

The Viking Tales DLC will send you and Clicky on a quest through norse culture and mythology to discover all of the hidden treasures and myths the vikings have kept from us.
You’ll encounter numerous viking clans, Norse gods and elves!

This DLC includes 10 new levels ranging from viking invasions to peaceful elven villages.
It also includes 400 new viking themed objects that are available in the level editor for those of you who can’t get enough of these ransacking clans!

People who don’t own this DLC will still be able to play through user created maps that use objects from the Viking Tales DLC.

Be quick, put on your viking helmet and plunder this DLC to explore the Scandinavian myths about ruthless raiders, winged valkyries and colossal giants.

70050000020567.name: Klassic Femme Fatale Skin Pack
70050000020567.description: Three new character skins. The Klassic Femme Fatale Skin Pack outfits Mortal Kombat 11 characters in Klassic, MK3 inspired costumes and includes Sole Survivor Kitana, Outworld Courtier Jade and Old Blood Skarlet.

70050000020568.name: All Hallows' Eve Skin Pack
70050000020568.description: Three new character skins. Celebrate a bloody Halloween with the All Hallows' Eve Skin Pack. Play as Beast Within Johnny Cage, Bad Medicine D'Vorah and Blizzard King Sub-Zero.

70050000020641.name: The Survivalists - Monkey Business Pack
70050000020641.intro: Finding the perils of island life too much? Well, quit monkeying around and survive in style with the Monkey Business pack!
70050000020641.description:
If you want to wear the latest in castaway fashion, this additional content grants you the Box-Ex side quest where a ‘special delivery’ has been lost in the mail…for you to find! 

Locate the crashed plane to be the envy of the islands and obtain:  

3 Player Hats: Straw Hat, Escapists Guard Hat and Unicorn Hat 

6 Monkey Hats: Top Hat, Lumberjack Hat, Chef Hat, Crown, Hard Hat and Pirate Hat

70050000020701.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum'n'Fun! - Song "GODSONG"
70050000020701.description: Get access to this additionnal song.

70050000020702.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! "Over 1 Million Sold Celebration! I LOVE GAMES" Pack
70050000020702.description:
Get access to this additionnal content:

- Boku no→Chikyu, Bokura no Chikyu
- MOJIPITTAN Medley
- KATAMARI on the rock ~ Main theme
- No Way Back
- The arrow was shot
- IN THE ZONE
- Brave Sword, Braver Soul
- KARMA(Tatsujin Mix)
- NAMCOT Medley
- Fun-Filled Drum-Filled Taiko Dojo

70050000020705.name: Trials® Rising Starter Pack #1
70050000020705.description:
Begin your journey to fame and glory with the Trials® Rising Starter Pack!

Get instant access  the Shopping Cart Fun Bike and experience a hilarious new way to ride through the tracks, and the Premium Knight Outfit for your rider. This also includes 60 acorns of in-game currency.

70050000020706.name: Trials® Rising Starter Pack #2
70050000020706.description:
Begin your journey to fame and glory with the Trials® Rising Starter Pack!

Get instant access to The Back to the Fusion Track Pack with five new tracks to master and the Premium Cyborg Outfit for your rider. This also includes 60 Acorns of in-game currency.

70050000020781.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum'n'Fun! - Pops Pack 5
70050000020781.description:
Get access to this additionnal content:

- AMBIVALENT
- Sekai Wa Anata Ni Waraikakete Iru
- Winding Road

70050000020782.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! Donder Pack -NatsuOri- Vol. 1
70050000020782.description:
Get access to this additionnal content:

- Ko Ki Ku Kuru Kuru Kure Ko!
- Rotter Tarmination
- YUUJOU POP
- Myosotis
- Drawing☆Dream!

70050000020791.name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI - Ethiopia Pack
70050000020791.description:
This content pack introduces Menelik II as the leader of Ethiopia. Ethiopia focuses on cities built on Hills, generating Faith and using Menelik’s “Council of Ministers” ability to boost Science and Culture. It also includes the Secret Societies game mode, where players will encounter mysterious organizations who offer their civilization their powerful skills.

Includes the Ethiopia civilization with Menelik II, the Oromo Cavalry unique unit, and the Rock-Hewn Church tile improvement.
•	Civ Unique Ability: Aksumite Legacy. Cities earn extra Faith from resources, boosted even further when international trade routes originate from resource-rich cities. Ethiopia can purchase Archaeology Museums and Archaeologists with Faith.
•	Leader Unique Ability: Council of Ministers. Menelik II gets extra Culture and Science based on the Faith output of cities founded on Hills. His units also get extra Combat Strength when fighting on Hills.
•	Unique Unit: The Oromo Cavalry has improved Combat Strength and Sight, and suffers no movement penalty for moving on Hills.
•	Unique Tile Improvement: The Rock-Hewn Church can only be built on Hills or Volcanic Soil. It provides Faith with extra Faith from Mountains and Hills. It can only be pillaged, not destroyed, by natural disasters.

New “Secret Societies” Game Mode (Requires the Civilization VI Expansion Bundle to play)
•	An optional, specialized game mode with exclusive rule changes:
•	Adds four Secret Societies to the game.
•	Each Secret Society offers players a specialized Governor who applies their bonuses across the entire civilization.
•	Secret Societies may offer players new Resources, passive bonuses, unique buildings, units, or projects to further the Society’s ends.
•	Use your Secret Society membership to boost favorability and Alliances with other leaders.

New Diplomatic Quarter District and Buildings
•	Build the Diplomatic Quarter, a District that can only be built once per civilization, focusing on foreign relations.
•	Enhance the Diplomatic Quarter by building the Consulate and Chancery buildings.

70050000020792.name: Neon Abyss - The Lovable Rogues Pack
70050000020792.intro: Want some back-up to take into Neon Abyss? Bring in the Lovable Rogues with this character pack containing two of Titan’s experiments with their own unique abilities
70050000020792.description:
Add two new colorful rogues to your roster of characters, each with a unique ability to help you tackle the Abyss and bring the New Gods to their knees! 

Saya 
An experiment conducted by Titan Corp, Saya will bring a katana to the fight, slaying enemies in close combat with powerful sword strikes. 

Amir 
Another member who was subject to nefarious experiments by Titan Corp. Amir joins Saya in your battle to conquer the Abyss with his strong mental abilities

70050000020793.name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI - Byzantium & Gaul Pack
70050000020793.description: The Byzantium & Gaul Pack introduces Basil II as the leader of Byzantium and Ambiorix as the leader of Gaul. The Byzantine Empire can subjugate enemies with religious and military might, supported by their two unique units, the Dromon Ship and the Tagma. The Gallic horde focuses on military flexibility boosted by a backbone of culture and production with their unique Oppidum district. Also included is the new Dramatic Ages game mode, a new Map Type (The Highlands) and two new World Wonders (Biosphere & Statue of Zeus.)

70050000020794.name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI - Babylon Pack
70050000020794.description: The Babylon Pack introduces Hammurabi as the leader of Babylon. The Babylon civilization excels at Science, as well as Government and Infrastructure. Also included is the new Heroes and Legends game mode, two Unique Improvements (The Mahavihara and The Trading Dome), six new City-States, and 24 New Great People.

70050000020795.name: Civilization VI - New Frontier Pass (5)
70050000020795.description:
Continue your quest to build your greatest empire with the Civilization VI - New Frontier Pass, featuring eight new civilizations and nine new leaders, and a variety of new gameplay content, including six new game modes. Delivering six DLC packs on a bimonthly basis from May 2020 to March 2021, the New Frontier Pass includes:

• Pack #1: Maya & Gran Colombia Pack. Adds two new civilizations and leaders, one new game mode*, new City States, Resources, and Natural Wonders. Available May 2020.
• Pack #2: Ethiopia Pack. Adds one new civilization and leader, one new game mode*, one new District and two new Buildings. Available July 2020.
• Pack #3: Adds two new civilizations and leaders, one new game mode*, new World Wonders, and one new map. Available September 2020.
• Pack #4: Adds one new civilization and leader, one new game mode, new City States, and numerous new Great People. Available November 2020.
• Pack #5: Adds one new civilization and two new leaders**, one new game mode, a new District, and two new Buildings. Available January 2021.
• Pack #6: Adds one new civilization and leader, one new game mode, new World Wonders, and one new map. Available March 2021. 

*New game mode requires the Civilization VI Expansion Bundle to play.
**New leader requires the Civilization VI Expansion Bundle to play.

Game modes can include additional content such as new units, buildings, or improvements and can be turned on or off during game setup to apply significant and dramatic changes to the rules of the game.

Exclusive bonus: Teddy Roosevelt and Catherine De Medici Persona Packs.  Each Persona Pack contains a brand-new take on a favorite leader, with a new leader model and background, new gameplay bonuses, and an updated agenda that reflect the changes to the leader’s personality. The Persona Packs are available exclusively to owners of the New Frontier Pass and will be delivered with the second add-on pack.

70050000020796.name: Civilization VI - New Frontier Pass (6)
70050000020796.description:
Continue your quest to build your greatest empire with the Civilization VI - New Frontier Pass, featuring eight new civilizations and nine new leaders, and a variety of new gameplay content, including six new game modes. Delivering six DLC packs on a bimonthly basis from May 2020 to March 2021, the New Frontier Pass includes:

• Pack #1: Maya & Gran Colombia Pack. Adds two new civilizations and leaders, one new game mode*, new City States, Resources, and Natural Wonders. Available May 2020.
• Pack #2: Ethiopia Pack. Adds one new civilization and leader, one new game mode*, one new District and two new Buildings. Available July 2020.
• Pack #3: Adds two new civilizations and leaders, one new game mode*, new World Wonders, and one new map. Available September 2020.
• Pack #4: Adds one new civilization and leader, one new game mode, new City States, and numerous new Great People. Available November 2020.
• Pack #5: Adds one new civilization and two new leaders**, one new game mode, a new District, and two new Buildings. Available January 2021.
• Pack #6: Adds one new civilization and leader, one new game mode, new World Wonders, and one new map. Available March 2021. 

*New game mode requires the Civilization VI Expansion Bundle to play.
**New leader requires the Civilization VI Expansion Bundle to play.

Game modes can include additional content such as new units, buildings, or improvements and can be turned on or off during game setup to apply significant and dramatic changes to the rules of the game.

Exclusive bonus: Teddy Roosevelt and Catherine De Medici Persona Packs.  Each Persona Pack contains a brand-new take on a favorite leader, with a new leader model and background, new gameplay bonuses, and an updated agenda that reflect the changes to the leader’s personality. The Persona Packs are available exclusively to owners of the New Frontier Pass and will be delivered with the second add-on pack.

70050000020797.name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI - Teddy Roosevelt Persona Pack
70050000020797.description: The Teddy Roosevelt Persona Pack is available exclusively to owners of the New Frontier Pass and features “Rough Rider Teddy” with a new leader model and background, new gameplay bonuses, and an updated agenda that reflect the changes to his personality. Rough Rider Teddy excels at keeping the peace on his home continent.

70050000020798.name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI - Catherine de Medici Persona Pack
70050000020798.description: The Catherine de Medici Persona Pack is available exclusively to owners of the New Frontier Pass and features “Magnificence Catherine” with a new leader model and background, new gameplay bonuses, and an updated agenda that reflect the changes to her personality. Magnificence Catherine can use Luxuries to overwhelm the world with Culture and Tourism.

70050000020823.name: Ninjara Wig + Outfit
70050000020823.description:
A Mii Brawler costume of Ninjara from ARMS is now available, complete with trademark green hair, silver goggles and blue mask! 
Become the "student of stealth" and take control of the fight with style!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Ninjara Wig
・ Ninjara Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000020824.name: Callie Wig + Outfit
70050000020824.description:
A Mii Brawler costume is now available of the happy-go-lucky, carefree member of the Squid Sisters, Callie from the Splatoon series! When creating a Mii, don't forget the mole under the left eye! Stay fresh!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Callie Wig
・ Callie Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000020825.name: Marie Wig + Outfit
70050000020825.description:
A Mii Gunner costume is now available of the cool, calm and collected member of the Squid Sisters, Marie from the Splatoon series! Anyone who feels like a Turf War battle can blast away with a Hero Shot! Stay fresh!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Marie Wig
・ Marie Outfit (for Gunners)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000020826.name: Vault Boy Mask + Vault 111 Jumpsuit
70050000020826.description:
Vault Boy's costume from the Fallout series is now available for Mii Gunners! The jumpsuit, blonde hair, and disarming smile have been re-created perfectly. Control Vault-Tec Corporation’s mascot, equipped with a futuristic sidearm, and join in the battle!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Vault Boy Mask
・ Vault 111 Jumpsuit (for Gunners)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000020827.name: Heihachi Wig + Outfit
70050000020827.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of Heihachi from the Tekken series is now available for purchase. That spiky hair and embroidered tiger on the black gi are really intimidating! The King of Iron Fist is not a title easily claimed — take out your rivals and prove yourself worthy!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Heihachi Wig
・ Heihachi Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000020882.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Target Führer
70050000020882.description:
Hidden in a forgotten corner of the Mediterranean, a secret Nazi U-boat facility threatens Allied shipping.
 When agent Karl Fairburne attempts to assassinate the base’s Commander, he finds his target already dead, executed in person by a shadowy visitor. Karl’s mission has changed: Target Führer! 
 Destroy the U-boat base and take down Hitler in as many ways as you can in this replayable campaign mission for 1-2 players.

70050000020884.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Covert Heroes Character Pack
70050000020884.description: Expand your force with these three formidable warriors - a female sniper, commando and ghillie-clad trooper.

70050000020902.name: Party Hard 2 DLC: Alien Butt Form
70050000020902.description: Something has been very wrong with parties in the city of Aho Bay recently. Who really controlled Party Hard Killer? Why it took so long for the police to catch him? Where are those tentacles grow from, for Christ’s sake? Find out in this brand new DLC, fueled by booze and hilarity.

70050000020903.name: TIM Track Pack
70050000020903.description:
Continue the AVICII Invector party with the TIM Track Pack DLC for AVICII: Invector. The TIM Track Pack includes five additional fan-loved tracks from the album TIM. 

Tracklist: 
1) Bad Reputation 
2) Freak 
3) Heart Upon My Sleeve 
4) Peace Of Mind 
5) SOS

70050000020904.name: Magma Track Pack
70050000020904.description:
Keep the AVICII Invector party going with FIVE new tracks to play, all set in the brand new new Magma world setting. AVICII Invector - Magma Track Pack brings highly requested tracks from across the AVICII back catalogue to AVICII Invector for the first time ever, along with an additional all-new Magma World. 

Tracklist: 
1) Trouble 
2) Sunshine 
3) Addicted To You 
4) My Feelings For You 
5) Seek Bromance

70050000021131.name: Additional Friends Set "Lyon"
70050000021131.intro: A set that includes the playable character "Lyon", an additional story, and costumes.
70050000021131.description:
Note: This content is also included in the "FAIRY TAIL Season Pass" that is available as a separate purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Note: Each content item can be enjoyed by advancing the game to a certain point.

A set that includes the playable character "Lyon", an additional story, and costumes.

Included Content:
●Playable Character "Lyon"
Allows players to place Lyon in their team as a playable character.

●Character Story
Allows Lyon's "Character Story" to be triggered at the beginning of chapter 7, episode 1. By advancing the "Character Story", Lyon will be added as a companion.

●3 Special Costumes for Lyon
The following 3 costumes are added:
 - Lyon's Costume "Special Swimsuit"
 - Lyon's Costume "Anime Final Season"
 - Lyon's Costume "Dress-Up"

Note: The "Special Swimsuit" and "Anime Final Season" costumes are unlocked when the character is added as a companion.
Note: The "Dress-Up" costume is added when the character's Rank becomes 4.

70050000021132.name: Additional Friends Set "Levy"
70050000021132.intro: A set that includes the playable character "Levy", an additional story, and costumes.
70050000021132.description:
Note: This content is also included in the "FAIRY TAIL Season Pass" that is available as a separate purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Note: Each content item can be enjoyed by advancing the game to a certain point.

A set that includes the playable character "Levy", an additional story, and costumes.

Included Content:
●Playable Character "Levy"
Allows players to place Levy in their team as a playable character.

●Character Story
Allows Levy's "Character Story" to be triggered at the beginning of chapter 3, episode 3. By advancing the "Character Story", Levy will be added as a companion.

●3 Special Costumes for Levy
The following 3 costumes are added:
 - Levy's Costume "Special Swimsuit"
 - Levy's Costume "Anime Final Season"
 - Levy's Costume "Dress-Up"

Note: The "Special Swimsuit" and "Anime Final Season" costumes are unlocked when the character is added as a companion.
Note: The "Dress-Up" costume is added when the character's Rank becomes 4.

70050000021133.name: Additional Friends Set "Lisanna & Elfman"
70050000021133.intro: A set that includes the playable characters "Lisanna & Elfman", an additional story, and costumes.
70050000021133.description:
Note: This content is also included in the "FAIRY TAIL Season Pass" that is available as a separate purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Note: Each content item can be enjoyed by advancing the game to a certain point.

A set that includes the playable characters "Lisanna & Elfman", an additional story, and costumes.

Included Content:
●Playable Characters "Lisanna" and "Elfman"
Allows players to place Lisanna and Elfman in their team as playable characters.

●Character Story
Allows Lisanna and Elfman's "Character Story" to be triggered during chapter 3, episode 1. By advancing the "Character Story", Lisanna and Elfman will be added as companions.

●3 Special Costumes for Lisanna & Elfman
The following 6 costumes are added:
 - Lisanna's Costume "Special Swimsuit"
 - Elfman's Costume "Special Swimsuit"
 - Lisanna's  Costume "Anime Final Season"
 - Elfman's  Costume "Anime Final Season"
 - Lisanna's Costume "Dress-Up"
 - Elfman's  Costume "Dress-Up"

Note: The "Special Swimsuit" and "Anime Final Season" costumes are unlocked when the characters are added as companions.
Note: The "Dress-Up" costumes are added when the characters' Ranks become 4.

70050000021134.name: Additional Dungeon "Rift in Time and Space"
70050000021134.intro: Enable players to access the additional dungeon "Rift in Time and Space".
70050000021134.description:
Note: This content is also included in the "FAIRY TAIL Season Pass" that is available as a separate purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Note: Each content item can be enjoyed by advancing the game to a certain point.

Enable players to access the additional dungeon "Rift in Time and Space".

Included Content:
●Dungeon "Rift in Time and Space"
Enables players to access "Rift in Time and Space", dungeon in which the terrain and the monsters that appear change randomly. The further they advance, the stronger enemies will be, and in the depths of the dungeon, a powerful boss awaits them.

Note: The content is unlocked at the beginning of chapter 3, episode 2.

●Boss Event "VS Igneel"
Igneel appears as the final boss of the dungeon, triggering a corresponding battle and conversation events.

70050000021135.name: Very Difficult Requests Set
70050000021135.intro: A set that adds special requests that are more difficult than those in the main game.
70050000021135.description:
Note: This content is also included in the "FAIRY TAIL Season Pass" that is available as a separate purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Note: Each content item can be enjoyed by advancing the game to a certain point.

A set that adds special requests that are more difficult than those in the main game.

Included Content:
●S-Rank Requests
Allows 3 varieties of S-Rank Requests to be taken on.

●10-Year Quest
Allows 1 10-Year Quest to be taken on.

●100-Year Quest
Allows 1 100-Year Quest to be taken on.

Note: The contents are unlocked during the epilogue, episode 6, and can be accepted from the request board.

70050000021153.name: Vault Shopper Set 2 - Classic Tickets & Gold for Music, Mii Costumes and More
70050000021153.description:
This is a special offer for Nintendo Switch Online members.
You can download the following items free of charge for use in Super Smash Bros. Ultimate!

・ 3000 Gold
・ Classic Ticket x5

70050000021207.name: Special Erza Costume: Miss Fairy Tail
70050000021207.description:
Special Erza Costume: Miss Fairy Tail is added.

Note: Costumes can be changed from the "Dresser" at "Lucy's House" after advancing the game to a certain point.

70050000021208.name: Bonus Lacrima (Handy in the Game's Early Stages) x 5
70050000021208.description:
5 varieties of "Lacrima" that can be equipped to power-up characters are added.

[Lacrima included]

●Wizard Lacrima
Effect: Parameters related to attacking are increased.
●Lucky Lacrima
Parameters related to luck are increased.
●Accelerator Lacrima
Effect: Parameters related to speed are increased.
●Energy Lacrima
Effect: Maximum HP is increased.
●Mind Lacrima
Effect: Maximum MP is increased.

Note: Lacrima can be equipped from "Main Menu" after advancing the game to a certain point.

70050000021236.name: Ninjala: Crow Tengu Bundle DLC Pack
70050000021236.intro: Fly into battle in style with the limited edition Crow Tengu Bundle DLC Pack!
70050000021236.description:
The Crow Tengu Bundle contains:

-Crow Tengu Attire
-Crow Tengu Mask
-Yantsu Emote
-Ninja Gumchi Sticker
-2000 Jala

* Limit 1 purchase per account
* Jala (in-game currency) comes in two varieties: paid and free. Paid Jala will be consumed first.

70050000021276.name: #InfiniPrison
70050000021276.intro: Unlock a unique time-attack level and donate to help refugees.
70050000021276.description:
When you purchase this DLC:

∞ You unlock new content at the end of the 4th tombstone, where Hope is trapped in War’s lair. Ignite your jetpack and propel yourself through a challenging time-attack level. Share your score with the community using #InfiniPrison!

∞ Nakana.io will donate their net revenue from your purchase to the UN Refugee Agency. It provides protection, shelter, health and education to the millions of people who have been forced to flee from their homes and restart their lives.

“We sympathize with the refugees, returnees, stateless people, internally displaced and asylum-seekers and want to help by offering this content in return for your donation.” - Barnaque and Nakana.io

Visit the website Nakana.io to get more detail on how the DLC sales will be used.

70050000021279.name: 2011 Honda TRX450R
70050000021279.description:
Start your engines! Purchase the TRX450R ATV from Honda and experience real off-road riding!

You may have already purchased this downloadable content separately or as part of a bundle.

70050000021282.name: Faeria: Premium Edition
70050000021282.description:
With its unique living board, Faeria will challenge you with truly strategic card battles. Craft your deck, shape the battlefield, and fight for victory!

Unlock the Premium Faeria experience. This package provides a mixture of accelerated progress and exclusive items. Maximize your time spent in Faeria with DOUBLE XP, more deck slots, special cosmetics and more!

XP in Faeria is your main source of card collection. No buying card packs here - win it all by playing the game.

Looking to get the most out of Faeria? This content is for you.

This content includes the following:

• Doubled XP - from everything!
• Earn Battle Chests and Shards at twice the normal rate.
• 10 ADDITIONAL Deck Slots
• Premium card back
• Golden Faeria logo
• 5 Mythic Chests full of cosmetics
• 40,000 Shards

This is a one-time purchase and will be applied FOREVER to your Faeria account.

The Golden Faeria Logo is visible at all times on the main screen of the interface.

70050000021284.name: Faeria: Fall of Everlife
70050000021284.description:
Emperor Kaios has consumed the Fruit of Everlife, unleashing a terrible corruption into the Oversky. Band together with the Yaks and Rakoans to fight it off!

Fall of Everlife introduces 40 BRAND NEW cards to add to your collection.

These new cards feature the latest new mechanics and keywords, including the powerful CORRUPT: Does something the first time this creature moves onto enemy land any turn after it is played.

Fall of Everlife also introduces SUBTYPES into Faeria. Subtypes provide additional synergy between the creature cards in your deck. Finally, you can summon a herd of Yaks to dominate your opponent.

Subtypes introduced in this DLC:

• Yaks
• Rakoans
• Beasts

You only need to purchase this content once to get it all! Unlocking this content will allow the new cards to appear in your Battle Chests - remember, Battle Chests NEVER contain duplicates.

Additionally, purchasing this content immediately adds a unique Avatar, Orb, Well and Card Back to your collection!

70050000021286.name: Faeria: Resurgence
70050000021286.description:
War rages.

Corruption spreads across the world, threatening to taint all things good and pure. New monsters and wicked men flock to the Imperial banner, hoping to share in the spoils of war.

Despite suffering great losses, hope blooms in the hearts of those who choose to fight back. Victory, against all odds, appears to be possible with new allies joining the cause.

Faeria: Resurgence introduces 40 BRAND NEW cards to add to your collection.

Stoke the flames of war with the wrath of Ignus himself. Use the Power Wheel to your advantage and make every choice count.

Turn the size of your opponent’s hand against them with a selection of haunting new cards.

Command the embattled Radiance with the help of its noble imperial captain, Banon. 

Jump into action with the newest support subtype in Faeria!

You didn’t think there’d be no Yaks, did you?

All of these cards and MORE

Additionally, purchasing this content immediately adds a unique Avatar, Orb, Well and Card Back to your collection!

70050000021288.name: Faeria: Elements
70050000021288.description:
Test your might and face the elements.

This Puzzle Pack for Faeria contains 40 additional brain-twisting challenges for you to complete.

Can you overcome the elements and earn the exclusive cardback?

Your usual puzzle master, Jalmyr, has stepped aside to allow the elements to take over.

Do you have what it takes to defeat them?

Elements contains:

• 40 new puzzles, ranging from low to extreme difficulty.
• The equivalent of 10 Mythic Chests in rewards (both in the form of shards and Mythic Chests).
• The exclusive 'Elements' card back.
• Earn this card back by completing a selection of the most difficult puzzles inside.

Warning: Many of these puzzles are quite difficult!

70050000021290.name: Faeria: Chronicles of Gagana
70050000021290.description:
Faeria: Chronicles of Gagana introduces 40 BRAND NEW cards to add to your collection.

Emperor Kaios has been defeated and the Oversky is saved.

This victory is short-lived, however, as the climate begins to slowly deteriorate, and extreme winds soon blow over the globe.

In search for a solution to the new, impending cataclysm, the crew of the Gagana ventures out into uncharted territory.

They will encounter new civilizations, new continents, new creatures.... and in the end: the Treasures of Gagana.

Find and accumulate powerful new Treasure cards that can also be played in Pandora mode.

Discover cards embrace the core theme of exploration and discovery.

The Mecha are a brand new subtype introduced with the Chronicles of Gagana. The Mecha are a sentient race of machines that the crew of Gagana will encounter on their voyages.

Chronicles of Gagana includes a brand new battlefield background, or shore, which represents the capital city of the Mecha - Heartforge.

Additionally, purchasing this content immediately adds a unique Avatar, Orb, Well and Card Back to your collection!

70050000021292.name: Faeria: All Avatars
70050000021292.description:
This DLC immediately unlocks all of the Avatars cosmetic items that are also able to be unlocked through in-game progression.

This package includes 50+ Avatars currently in-game and will include additional avatars as they are released.

Please note - this does NOT unlock special cosmetic content earned through Tournaments, Season Play, or offered through other DLC packs.

70050000021294.name: Faeria: All Cardbacks
70050000021294.description:
This DLC immediately unlocks all of the Cardback cosmetic items are also able to be unlocked through in-game progression.

This package includes 20+ Cardbacks currently in-game and will include additional cardbacks as they are released.

Please note - this does NOT unlock special cosmetic content earned through Tournaments, Season Play, or offered through other DLC packs.

70050000021296.name: Faeria: All Orbs
70050000021296.description:
This DLC immediately unlocks all of the Orbs cosmetic items that are also able to be unlocked through in-game progression.

Please note - this does NOT unlock special cosmetic content earned through Tournaments, Season Play, or offered through other DLC packs.

70050000021298.name: Faeria: All Wells
70050000021298.description:

This package includes 20+ Wells currently in-game and will include additional wells as they are released.

Please note - this does NOT unlock special cosmetic content earned through Tournaments, Season Play, or offered through other DLC packs.

70050000021339.name: Captain Tsubasa: RoNC Shutetsu Uniform
70050000021339.description:
Unlocks Shutetsu's uniform, a team Tsubasa Ozora and friends previously played against, as a custom team uniform in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

Defy The Laws of Football
Become Legend

* DLC can be used in Versus and Online Versus matches.

70050000021340.description:

Includes the following:
- Meiwa FC Uniform
- Tsubasa's Challenge Ball to Wakabayashi
Customise even more your team and matches with these news items!

Defy The Laws of Football
Become Legend

70050000021341.name: Captain Tsubasa: RoNC Acrobatic/Closeup Goal Performances
70050000021341.description:
Enables you to customize your custom character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions with two goal performances: Acrobatic and Uniform Closeup.
Celebrate your goals as it must and show who is the legend on the pitch!

Defy The Laws of Football
Become Legend

* DLC can be used in Versus and Online Versus matches.

70050000021342.name: Captain Tsubasa: RoNC All-Japan Junior Youth Uniform
70050000021342.description:

Suit your team up with the renowned uniform of the youth national team.

Defy The Laws of Football
Become Legend

* DLC can be used in Versus and Online Versus matches.

70050000021343.name: Captain Tsubasa: RoNC Open Sky Uniform Set
70050000021343.description:

Customise even more your team and matches with these news items!

Defy The Laws of Football
Become Legend

70050000021345.name: Captain Tsubasa: RoNC Hawk Uniform Set
70050000021345.description:

70050000021373.name: Journey to the Savage Planet: Hot Garbage
70050000021373.description: The home of Kindred's brand new proposed resort 'Boomerdale' has been reporting a spike it atmospheric pollutants. They want you to get in there and figure out why. You'll gather some fresh upgrades, and be introduced to the second best interstellar space exploration company... But why are they there? And what do you need to do to get rid of them? This expansion pack features new abilities to gather and craft that you can take back to the main game, plus, perhaps the power of flight!! (Which you cannot take back to the main game but whatever... it's fun while it lasts!)

70050000021430.name: Character Pack #8
70050000021430.intro: Experience exciting new adventures with 3 new characters for Talisman: Digital Edition.
70050000021430.description:
Add the Satyr, Pilgrim and Vampire to your Talisman: Digital Edition character roster with this pack.

The Satyr is ready to get the party started, even if nobody else is! Race your way to the Crown of Command, using every trick and shortcut you can think of.

Dedicated to his cause, the Pilgrim sets out for the Crown of Command with faith as his sword and belief as his shield. Nothing will stop his righteous charge!

Cast out of the Vampire’s Tower for his crimes, the Vampire is ready to begin his bloody reign over the land of Talisman. Only one thing can help him achieve his goals… the Crown of Command!

Purchase this character pack to add these three characters to your character collection. They are then available to choose in all game modes.

70050000021460.intro: Dive into a magnificent underwater world with this package of 5 stunning aquatic views - each has different beautiful water creatures.
70050000021460.description: All puzzles have from 6 to 150 pieces and can be done in solo or coop mode.

70050000021461.name: Mountains Pack
70050000021461.description: This pack contains 10 different landscapes - from snowy peaks, through misty mountain ranges to tropical islands. All puzzles have from 6 to 150 pieces and can be done in solo or coop mode.

70050000021462.intro: This package is a feast for fans of challenging jigsaws!
70050000021462.description:
In addition to 10 new images (such as beautiful animals and magical landscapes), all puzzles in the Special Square Pack have either more pieces or are in a non-standard shape which will significantly impede arranging! Among them you will find:

- Square standard puzzles, 64 and 100 pieces.
- Hex-shaped images, 38 and 79 pieces.
- Unique, more challenging flower-shaped images,121 pieces.

70050000021505.name: Titan Quest: Ragnarök
70050000021505.description:
At long last, Titan Quest continues its epic journey through the world of antiquity. A mysterious threat calls the heroes of Hades to the uncharted lands of northern Europe, where new enemies await and new powers and treasures are waiting to be found!

This new expansion to the acclaimed Edition of Titan Quest adds a fifth act of unprecedented scope, along with many new and requested features including new weapon types and a 10th Mastery for your characters to learn.

70050000021506.name: Titan Quest: Atlantis
70050000021506.description:
The Hero meets an explorer that is searching for the mythical kingdom of Atlantis, and together they set out on a journey across the western 
Mediterranean. The key lies in the legendary Diary of Herakles, rumored to be in the Phoenician City of Gadir, but their journey will take 
them beyond the edges of the known world...

70050000021581.name: TRANSFORMERS: BATTLEGROUNDS – Nemesis Prime & Goldfire Bumblebee Skin Pack
70050000021581.description: Once purchased, the Nemesis Prime & Goldfire Bumblebee skins will then become selectable in the game under the SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

70050000021583.name: TRANSFORMERS: BATTLEGROUNDS – Energon Autobot Skin Pack
70050000021583.description: Once purchased, the Energon Autobot skins will then become selectable in the game under the SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

70050000021590.name: TRANSFORMERS: BATTLEGROUNDS – Gold Autobot Skin Pack
70050000021590.description: Once purchased, the Gold Autobot skins will then become selectable in the game under the SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

70050000021591.name: TRANSFORMERS: BATTLEGROUNDS – Neon Autobot Skin Pack
70050000021591.description: Once purchased, the Neon Autobot skins will then become selectable in the game under the SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

70050000021592.name: TRANSFORMERS: BATTLEGROUNDS – Battle Autobot Skin Pack
70050000021592.description: Once purchased, the Battle Autobot skins will then become selectable in the game under SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

70050000021593.name: TRANSFORMERS: BATTLEGROUNDS - CUBE Game Arcade Add-on
70050000021593.description:
Up to two players team up as the Autobots against the Decepticons in the greatest sport in the Galaxy, CUBE! Play as the Autobots, solo or with a friend, across four unique Arenas. Once the CUBES are let loose, hold on for as long as possible to score points. Each Autobot and Decepticon has their own special abilities to help your team keep the CUBE.

Once purchased, the CUBE Game will become available to play in Arcade Mode.

70050000021617.name: MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2 Outlaw Suit Costume Set
70050000021617.description:
Players will be able to use Outlaw Suit costumes for the following 8 characters: Tomura Shigaraki: Before Style, Tomura Shigaraki, Dabi, Himiko Toga, Twice, Mr. Compress, Muscular, and Kai Chisaki.

This pack also includes 10 color variations for each costume.

Contents:
- Outlaw Suit Costumes for Tomura Shigaraki: Before Style, Tomura Shigaraki, Dabi, Himiko Toga, Twice, Mr. Compress, Muscular, and Kai Chisaki.
- 10 Costume Color Variations for each Outlaw Suit costume

70050000021618.name: MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2 Cheerleader Costume Mei Hatsume
70050000021618.description:
Players will be able to use cheerleader costumes for playable character Mei Hatsume in-game. 

This pack also includes 10 color variations.

Contents:
- Cheerleader Costume for Mei Hatsume
- 10 Costume Color Variations

70050000021692.name: Urban Flow - Expansion Pack
70050000021692.intro:
Even in difficult times, traffic must flow.
You will face challenges that you have not seen before.
We believe you can handle them.
70050000021692.description:
Urban Flow is back with more content!

•    Did you finish the campaign? Check out our Challenge Mode!
•    Play more than 20 new stages!
•    New challenge mode offers medals - no more star system in challenge mode! You have to pass the challenge bar to pass the challenge mode stages.
•    Play alone or with friends!

Go ahead, test your skill!

70050000021718.name: Race With Ryan: Adventure Track Pack
70050000021718.description:
This is a Road Trip your little ones will never forget, without even having to leave the house they can race around 2 iconic USA tracks and see the sights of New York and Redwood.
Alongside the base game, Race With Ryan, this expansion pack unlocks more hours of fun with 1-4 players in the colourful world of YouTube sensation, Ryan!

70050000021754.name: Hunting Simulator 2 Bear Hunter Pack
70050000021754.description:
To track bears, a hunter must be fully equipped. Be prepared with the Bear Hunter Pack.

- Winchester XPR Strata Threaded rifle
This bolt-action rifle with mid-weight barrel is ideal for large-calibre accurate shooting. It's an excellent choice for hunting big game.

- Browning Maral SF Grade 5 Monte Carlo Fluted rifle
With a grade-5 Monte Carlo wood stock and ingenious bolt return system, the Maral SF rifle is a high-end model specially designed for experienced hunters.

- Bear hunting licence
Start tracking black bears and grizzlies right away with a free in-game bear hunting licence.

- Browning clothes
A complete outfit for hunting big game on the prowl:
• Hell's Canyon 2 Infinity
• Phase Liner gloves
• Trail-Lite cap

70050000021755.name: Hunting Simulator 2 Beretta Model 486 by Marc Newson
70050000021755.description:
Receive an exclusive premium shotgun with this downloadable content for Hunting Simulator 2.

This exceptional shotgun combines the renowned expertise of Beretta with a stunning design by Marc Newson.
Put it to good use in the game!

70050000021831.name: Adventure Chapter
70050000021831.intro: Complete your Coloring Book with the full Adventure Chapter!
70050000021831.description:
Welcome to a new adventure! 30 new quality drawings divided into 6 unique boards:
● Creatures from outer space
● Delicious looking desserts 
● Cute animals in the woods
● Adorable dogs in the living room 
● Mighty cats in a fantasy world

Get 30 new images to color!

70050000021913.name: Experience x3 - Alphadia Genesis
70050000021913.description:
All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000021914.name: SP x3 - Alphadia Genesis
70050000021914.description:
All characters' SP gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000021915.name: Experience & SP x2 - Alphadia Genesis
70050000021915.description:
All characters' experience and SP gained increases by 100%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000021916.name: No Encounters - Alphadia Genesis
70050000021916.description:
Enables the feature to configure the encounter rate.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000021917.name: Damage x2 - Alphadia Genesis
70050000021917.description:
Damage dealt to enemies is doubled.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000021918.name: Full Restore - Alphadia Genesis
70050000021918.description:
All characters' HP/EP are fully recovered after battle.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000021919.name: No Skill Cost - Alphadia Genesis
70050000021919.description:
Skills no longer consume EP in battles.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

 - Ihm Junior Yukata "Children's clothing based on traditional Wa summer clothes."

70050000022071.name: Soft Kid's White Cat
70050000022071.description:

 *You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.

70050000022073.name: Polar Travel Outfit (Noel)
70050000022073.description:

 - Polar Kid Traveler: Noel "Travel garb for kids created based on traditional clothing from the far northern Nuit region."
 *You can buy it at any time in the game shop (Clothing Store in Castle St.) when you purchase it.
