70050000022182.name: Ricky Carmichael Farm - GOAT
70050000022182.description: Compete and test your skills on the tracks that made a motocross legend! This track pack includes 2 Supercross tracks, 1 Nationals track, 2 Opencross tracks, and 1 Waypoint race!

70050000022183.name: Hometown MX Nationals
70050000022183.description: The most authentic outdoors track pack created to date. Featuring 4 huge Nationals tracks and 2 Freeride environments that you can explore with different time of day variations.

70050000022184.name: Slash's Snakepit
70050000022184.description: Go crazy on tracks designed by the legendary Slash! This track pack includes 3 amped up Supercross tracks and 1 insane freestyle map.

70050000022190.name: Hunting Simulator 2 Beretta Weapon Pack
70050000022190.description:
Beretta is the oldest firearms manufacturer in the world. Renowned for their reliability and performance, Beretta firearms are used by all the top hunters.
This weapons pack includes 7 Beretta shotguns for hunting small game, such as ducks and rabbits. These shotguns are designed for hunters looking for guaranteed performance with Beretta's renowned craftsmanship. With incredible ballistic performance and unmatched reliability, they are essential firearms in the gunrack of all the top hunters.

• 686 Silver Pigeon I
• 695
• A400 Upland
• A400 Xtreme PLUS True Timber DRT
• A400 Xtreme Plus Mossy Oak Bottomland
• A400 Xtreme Plus Synthetic
• A400 Xtreme Plus Max 5

70050000022192.name: Homestars Founder Pack
70050000022192.description:
Take Earth’s greatest heroes to the next level with this Legendary skin pack for HyperBrawl Tournament.
This pack includes:
- 2 Legendary skins for Tristan
- 2 Legendary skins for Bazooki
- 2 Legendary skins for Rip Deadly
- 2 Legendary skins for Lito
Note: To equip these skins the applicable hero must be unlocked in-game. Unlocking Heroes is free and achieved through gameplay.

70050000022284.name: Monster Truck Championship Patriot Pack
70050000022284.description:
Crush the competition with this exclusive pack! This pack contains 1 design and 1 vehicle.

The Patriot Pack includes:

- The Patriot Monster Truck; ideal for standing out from the crowd and winning tons of races!
- The Sergeant Chaos design, to impress your competitors and boost your rankings!

70050000022285.name: Monster Truck Championship Rebel Hunter Pack
70050000022285.description:
Make a name for yourself with this exclusive pack! This pack contains 1 design, 3 vehicles and 1 arena.

The Rebel Hunter Pack includes:

- 1 exclusive "Rebel Hunter" design; show everyone who's boss!
- 3  vehicles: Magnum, Victory and Frantic , the best US designs to crush the competition
- The Charleston racing arena

Show off your style and show everyone who's boss in all the arenas.

70050000022288.name: Tennis World Tour 2 Legends Pack
70050000022288.description: The Legends pack unlocks 2 players who left their mark on tennis history in the 2000s: Gustavo Kuerten and Marat Safin.

70050000022311.name: Pack 1: Character Pack
70050000022311.description: Take your musical journey for a new spin with five newly added characters: Impa, Aria, Frederick, Shadow Link and Shadow Zelda.

70050000022313.name: Pack 2: Melody Pack
70050000022313.description: Adds 39 new songs, including remixed versions of the game’s background music. You can change the background music at any time so you can listen to your favourite songs while journeying through Hyrule.

70050000022314.name: Pack 3: Additional Story Content - Symphony of the Mask
70050000022314.description: Play as the mysterious Skull Kid and venture through a brand-new map, complete with new songs and a new story. Plus, he has the power to change abilities based on the masks he dons. What awaits Skull Kid in these strange lands?

70050000022317.name: Season Pass Bonus Items
70050000022317.description: If you purchase the Season Pass, you’ll receive bonus costumes for Link and Zelda that you can use right away!

70050000022319.name: Minecraft Dungeons: Howling Peaks
70050000022319.description:
A strange power has corrupted the once lonely peaks of a distant mountain range, and now it threatens to take the world by storm. The trek to the top features dramatic highs and lows, from dazzling new armour, weapons, and artifacts to vicious new foes among the cliffs. New enemies such as the Squall Golem and Mountaineer wait at the summit for anyone brave enough to steal the root of their power. Atop it all is the source of the stormy conflict, the Tempest Golem, which must be defeated before all hope is blown away.
- Explore three exciting new missions.
- Encounter new terrifying mobs.
- Take down the Tempest Golem.
- Hold your ground against sweeping winds.
- New weapons, armour, and artifacts.

70050000022321.name: Touhou Project Arrangements Pack 4
70050000022321.intro: A new pack featuring 10 arranged songs, navigators, and avatars from Touhou Project!
70050000022321.description:
A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 arranged songs, navigators, and avatars from Touhou Fujinroku ~Mountain of Faith.!

This pack includes the following content.
■Song Pack (10 songs)
・1/8000000
・GROOVE IT LUCKY (GC Mix)
・Iro wa Nioedo Chirinuru wo (Fractal 1.5 ver)
・Ningen ga Daisuki na Kowareta Youkai no Uta *Houshou Marine Bonus Cover Song Included!
・Kiyoraka na Koufuku
・Tengu no Wabi Shoumon
・I
・Keep the Faith
・Foughten Field
・？？？（Secret）

■Navigator
・Syameimaru
・Sanae
・Suwako

■Avatar
・Hina(3D)
・Nitori(2D)
・Syameimaru(2D)
・Kanako(2D)

*Some content will be unlocked via missions after downloading.

70050000022322.name: Fantasy Island
70050000022322.intro:
Rescue the mythic bankimals!
Help start a super smoothie shop!
Can you make a profit?
70050000022322.description:
Mythical Adventure Awaits!
Suit up, Bionaut and get ready for an awesome new adventure! The Floating Islands and it’s amazing mythical creatures need you. Use your trash blaster to help save the minotaurs, dragons, unicorns and other mythological bankimals that inhabit the islands! Plus use your money sense to help Rainbow Cat’s smoothie business  get back up and running .

FEATURES
•	14 mythical bankimals to save!
•	Ride a magical Unicorn!
•	Glide through the air on a Dragon!
•	Collect golden eggs and plant a giant beanstalk!

70050000022329.name: Moto Rush GT - Expansion Pack
70050000022329.intro: Take new motorbikes for the spin!
70050000022329.description:
This DLC has:
-4 new motorbikes (each with special colors)
-New colors for the rest of motorbikes
-New colors for gloves
-Special, Golden colors for motorbikes

Customize your bikes and enjoy the ride!

70050000022444.intro: Looking for an Action Figure that stands out in the world of Hypercharge? Look no further, the Supporter Pack is made for you!

-The Great Wave off Kanagawa / Hokusai

-Ejiri in Suruga Province / Hokusai
-Suidobashi and Surugadai / Hiroshige

-Sakata Kaido-maru / Utagawa Kuniyoshi

70050000022473.name: Street Cats in Japan
70050000022473.description:

70050000022477.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Silent Warfare Weapons Pack
70050000022477.description: For stealth operations, three choice weapons - the Carbine (silenced), HDM and Grease Gun when you need to go loud.

70050000022478.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Allied Forces Rifle Pack
70050000022478.description: Take the fight to the Fascists with these Allied weapons – M1 Garand, M1 Carbine and Ross Mark 3. For use in all modes.

70050000022479.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Deathstorm Part 1: Inception
70050000022479.description: With the war in Italy raging, Karl Fairburne has a new assignment. The Alsos Mission – tasked with uncovering Nazi atomic secrets – have evidence that the Germans are trying to smuggle a vital package through northern Italy. Deathstorm: Inception is the first of a three-part campaign for 1-2 players continuing Karl’s escapades.He must infiltrate a secret Kriegsmarine facility and uncover the Nazis’ latest diabolical scheme...

70050000022480.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Night Fighter Expansion Pack
70050000022480.description: A night-time themed selection of weapons, camouflage skins for your rifle and camouflage outfits for characters. Weapons comprise the Mauser, OVP M1918 and Nagant (silent). For use in all modes.

70050000022481.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Deathstorm Part 2: Infiltration
70050000022481.description: Thanks to Karl’s efforts, the Allies are one step closing to finding out the nature of ‘Deathstorm’, the Nazis’ top secret atomic project. Dispatched to the heavily guarded University of Niroli in the Fascist-controlled north of Italy, Karl must locate an Italian scientist forced to work for the Nazis. Deathstorm: Infiltration is the second mission in a thrilling new three-part campaign for 1-2 players, sending Karl on a daring mission well behind enemy lines...

70050000022482.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Urban Assault Expansion Pack
70050000022482.description: For urban warfare, an arsenal of choice weapons, urban-themed camouflage rifle skins and urban-themed character outfits. Weapons comprise the Winchester, Sten and Walther PPK. For use in any mode.

70050000022483.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Cold Warfare Winter Expansion Pack
70050000022483.description: A range of winter-themed assets. Weapons comprise the ZH29, PPSH and Tokarev, plus winter-themed camouflage rifle skins and winter-themed camouflage character outfits. Can be used in all modes.

70050000022484.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Deathstorm Part 3: Obliteration
70050000022484.description: With the Nazis’ plans for ‘Deathstorm’ unveiled, Karl is assigned to the town of Steigerloch in Germany, to put the project out of action. If Karl fails, the implications for the Allies – and for the free world – are unthinkable. In Deathstorm: Obliteration, the conclusion of the thrilling three-part DLC campaign trilogy, the Sniper Elite will need all his cunning and guile to defeat the Nazi scheme... For 1-2 players.

70050000022485.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Lock and Load Weapons Pack
70050000022485.description: Smash your opponents with this pack of three fearsome weapons - the SVT, M30 Drilling and Mauser M712.

70050000022486.name: Sniper Elite 4 - Multiplayer Maps Pack
70050000022486.description: Go head-to-head with friends and take your sharpshooting to new heights with 8 intense multiplayer modes including Deathmatch, No Cross, Capture The Flag, and more, all set across 10 thrilling custom-designed maps. Includes matches for up to 4 players in local wireless play, and up to 8 players online.

70050000022501.name: Empire of Sin - The Good Son Pack
70050000022501.intro: Find out just how far a kind word and a gun will get you.
70050000022501.description:
Help Cyril Mcrae reconnect with his estranged father by fighting alongside him and recruiting him into your gang.

Includes exclusive in-game mission and recruitable gangster.

70050000022502.name: Empire of Sin - Deluxe Pack
70050000022502.intro: Find out just how far a kind word and a gun will get you.
70050000022502.description: The Deluxe Pack grants players the Deluxe Edition content including four unique recruitable gangsters, the Golden Weapon Set, and a unique execution animation for your boss character - the Curb Stomp Execution.

70050000022503.name: Empire of Sin - Al Capone's Fur Coat
70050000022503.intro: Find out just how far a kind word and a gun will get you.
70050000022503.description: Outfit your boss in style! Gangsters who manage to lay their hands on the Empire of Sin: Expansion Pass will receive an optional fur coat costume for their Al Capone boss.

70050000022561.name: 2K / adidas CodeChaos MyPLAYER Pack
70050000022561.description: Swing with swag! Deck out your PGA TOUR 2K21 MyPLAYER with a signal  green and core black look featuring adidas CodeChaos BOA Golf Shoes, and custom 2K/adidas CodeChaos Polo, Pants and Hat, designed by adidas, exclusively for PGA TOUR 2K21.

70050000022562.name: Golden Touch Pack
70050000022562.description: Hit the golf course and swing with class using the Golden Touch Pack included in the Digital Deluxe Edition. This pack features a gold-plated putter and gold-plated 10.5 driver that will turn heads while you dominate the green.

70050000022583.name: DOOM® Eternal (Campaign)
70050000022583.description:
DOOM® Eternal, the award-winning game and “one of the best first-person shooters ever” according to GameRevolution, is coming to Nintendo Switch. Developed by id Software and Panic Button, DOOM Eternal is the direct sequel to DOOM®, winner of The Game Awards’ Best Action Game of 2016. 

Hell’s armies have invaded Earth. Become the Slayer in an epic single-player campaign to conquer demons across dimensions and stop the final destruction of humanity. The only thing they fear…is you. 

Features:   

Slayer Threat Level at Maximum 

Experience the ultimate combination of speed and power in DOOM Eternal—the next leap in first-person combat powered by idTech 7. Armed with a shoulder-mounted flamethrower, wrist-mounted blade, upgraded guns, new abilities and more, you’re the greatest demon slayer in existence. 

Push-Forward Combat 

Take what you need from your enemies. Glory Kill demons to recover health, incinerate them to receive armor and cut them down with the Chainsaw to stock up on ammo.  

Motion Aiming Ready 

Improve your aim with a control option that allows you to aim using gyro controls. The option can be used in conjunction with the control stick for the perfect blend of immersion and accuracy.

70050000022584.name: DOOM® Eternal: Rip and Tear Pack
70050000022584.description:
Raze Hell with the Rip and Tear Pack and get in-game cosmetic items and additional single player content. This pack contains

- DOOT Revenant Skin, a premium player demon skin for use in BATTLEMODE

- Cultist Base Master Level, a remixed version of the campaign level with new challenges, combat encounters, and surprises

- Throwback Shotgun Weapon Skin, bring DOOM's classic shotgun to bear on DOOM Eternal's demon hordes

70050000022588.name: Razmi's Challenges
70050000022588.description: Razmi got bored in Ajna's inner realm and constructed a series of devilish challenges to humiliate her best fiend with! These challenges require a combination of Ajna's skills that will push her to the very limit, and test her ability to work together with her companions against insurmountable odds in battle. There's a prize at the end of it!

70050000022632.name: Piffle DLC 1: The Great Dessert
70050000022632.description:
Exciting worlds, challenging Blocks and brand new Piffle Balls await in Piffle DLC 1: The Great Dessert!

Consume 125 sweet new levels! Discover 2 new and delightful Piffle Balls - Rasmus the Viking and Sprinkles the Donut!

70050000022677.name: Endurance Championship - Gear.Club Unlimited 2
70050000022677.intro: Run on the 24H Le Mans circuit and enjoy a brand-new motorsport content and gameplay!
70050000022677.description:
Gear.Club Unlimited 2 gets to run on the 24H Le Mans circuit and offers a brand-new motorsport content and gameplay, in the Tracks Edition!

Discover a new motorsport experience in a new game mode focused on the Endurance Championship, an endurance racing event inspired by the 24H Le Mans event, the “Endurance Championship” campaign.

Drive on the legendary 24H Le Mans circuit by succeeding in challenging trials, driving new vehicles built for this mythical race: Nissan GT-R LM Nismo, Porsche 919 Hybrid, Mercedes AMG GT3 and Bentley Continental GT3-R.

If you’re strong enough, you will master the legendary Ford GT40 MK I Gulf, winner of the 24H Le Mans race in 1968 and 1969!

70050000022714.name: Asphalt 9: Legends -- Italian Pack
70050000022714.description:
Get a taste of some of the best Italian car manufacturers with 3 class-A vehicles from Ferrari, Lamborghini and Pagani. And boost your progression with Tokens and Credits, also included in this pack!
This pack contains:
• 50 blueprints to unlock the Ferrari 812 Superfast
• 50 blueprints to unlock the Lamborghini Aventador J
• 50 blueprints to unlock the Pagani Huayra BC
• 1,300,000 Credits
• 1,300 Tokens

70050000022718.name: 2020 AMA Pro Motocross Championship
70050000022718.description:
Compete like the pros on 12 official tracks from the 2020 AMA Pro Motocross Championship, plus the legendary Loretta Lynn’s!

The Fox Raceway series finale will unlock at a later date this fall.

70050000022743.name: Mana Spark: Forgotten Crypts
70050000022743.intro: Take on the role of a new character who, together with his faithful companion, will travel through the unexplored area in Forgotten Crypts!
70050000022743.description:
A BRAND NEW CHARACTER
Galiana, the Naturalist, dedicates her life to study plants and animals and how these can help humans survive. She attacks with a boomerang that marks enemies as a target for her loyal dog!!


NEW SCENARIO & NEW ENEMIES
New challenging floors of forgotten crypts to explore! There you will meet completely new enemies that will put your strategy to the proof. 

NEW UNLOCKABLE: SKILLS
A new NPC has joined us in the encampment. He has some valuable knowledge to share about new combat techniques.

NEW ITEMS
We had 31 in total, and we're adding 21 new ones! Some of our favourites are in this new pool.
We hope this is going to add a lot of variety to the runs.

LOCAL CO-OP MODE
Now you can explore the dungeons with a friend! The Player 2 gets to control the dog while Player 1 controls any of the 4 characters. This is not meant to be a hard challenge, but rather a very joyful two-players experience.

70050000022792.name: Hidden Through Time - Legends of Japan
70050000022792.intro: This DLC includes 10 new levels ranging from Japanese temples to Sumo tournaments. It also features more than 300 new Japan themed objects.
70050000022792.description:
Past the temples on Mount Fuji, through the rice fields around the hills, secrets lay hidden all across Japan.
The sun is rising and the Yokai are crossing from the spiritual lands into our material realm.

Join Clicky on a journey through Feudal Japan where you’ll experience the wonderful fireworks festivals and learn about the disciplined traditions of the samurai training in their dojos.

This DLC includes 10 new levels ranging from Japanese temples to Sumo tournaments.
It also features more than 300 new Japan themed objects and characters that will be available in the level editor upon purchase!

People who don’t own this DLC will still be able to play through user created maps that use objects from the Legends of Japan DLC.

Grab your katana and make your way through the bamboo forest where the DLC is waiting for you.

70050000022802.name: The Llama of Wall Street
70050000022802.description:
It’s time to play in the major leagues! El Presidente is descending on the world of international brands, big time. Power in politics is never enough for a man with ambitions as great as El Prez, so join forces with the shady…uh, completely trustworthy broker, and help Tropico to establish its status as a global megabrand. Unravel the secrets behind the broker’s sinister master plan, as you try to sabotage the US finance market. In order to assert yourself, you will have to be a llama among wolves. Well, something like that...
New gameplay mechanics await, as the prices of goods will now succumb to fluctuations and trends in the global market. Use new buildings like the Trade Institute to play the markets and manipulate export prices. Random events will pose an additional challenge, and you’ll also find lots of new content to dive into, like new traits, customization options and edicts.


Features:
• New standalone mission: “The Llama of Wall Street” – enter the world of big business
• New buildings: Trade Institute, Toy Workshop and Smart Furniture Studio will help to enhance your economic power 
• New gameplay mechanics: Goods are now subject to price fluctuations, trade impacts and trends – affect global markets by using the Trade Institute to forecast future trends and play the markets 
• New challenges: random events will occur and will have positive, negative or mixed effects on global market situations, trade or production
• New sandbox map: Acantilado Humeante
• New edict, traits and customization options for El Prez and your palace

70050000022806.name: Spitter
70050000022806.description:
It’s all about the fame and prestige. Nobody knows this better than a self-declared despot...uh, statesman, such as El Presidente. Tropico 6’s second DLC skyrockets you into the world of stardom and illustriousness. Interact with superstars by using Spitter, the only short message social networking app officially approved by the Tropican Ministry for Modern Communications & Smoke Signals. Court the stars to gain their support, unlock their individual strengths and in turn receive even more respect and adulation from your subjects. But beware - fame and money can also attract some seriously shady types…
At the heart of the DLC is the new Spitter mechanic, which allows you to interact with celebrities and faction leaders to increase your standing. Use new buildings like the Rehab Center or Beauty Farm to attract celebrities and make them permanent citizens of Tropico. Plus, enjoy even more new content with three new music tracks, additional customization items and a new trait for El Prez. 

• New Spitter Social Media feature: Interact with superstars and faction leaders via a social app, to increase your standing and unlock new special traits of the celebrities
• New mission and sandbox map 
• 3 new buildings: Lure celebrities to Tropico by building a Rehab Center or Beauty Farm and make them permanent residents using the Super Villa 
• New trait: Narcissist
• 3 new tracks: Comercio Feliz, La Celebridad, Fiesta en el Club
• 5 new customization options for El Prez and his palace

70050000022808.description:

• Kara’s Ancestral Attire
• Kara’s Ancestral Oar

Voyager Remix Version by Dear Gravity
White Dream by Yehezkel Raz

70050000023035.name: Northern Europe
70050000023035.description:
Railway Empire heads to ‘Northern Europe’ with its latest DLC. Aid the Swedish Parliament and construct a national railroad to continue the country’s far-reaching industrial advancements along the lakes and sprawling rivers that were first used by freight ships to provide goods and supplies to Northern Europe’s people.

• New scenario: Hibernation (1853-1870)
• Map expansion: ‘Northern Europe’ (available in Free Game and Sandbox modes)
• 3 historical engines: Odin (2-2-2), Prins August (2-4-0) and SJB II (4-6-0)
• 10 new tradeable goods (e.g. crisp bread and brown cheese) and 30 new cities 
• ‘Concession’ feature: The map is divided into sections. Buy concessions to gain access to new building grounds (Also available on the full North American map)
• Snow: Enhanced weather system for all northern regions in the game
• New regional soundtrack

70050000023056.name: Down Under
70050000023056.description:
During the first half of the 19th Century, the colonial territories of Australia are sparsely populated and consist primarily of coastal cities and a few smaller farming settlements in the remote outback. However, a series of events is set to spark an industrial revolution, one that will usher in an era of change for Australia and secure a lucrative future. In the Railway Empire “Down Under” DLC, it is up to you to tame the unforgiving outback and expand your railway network across its wild terrain and beyond. Your railway will ultimately be the key to laying the foundations for flourishing cities and to connecting remote mining settlements to coastal metropolises. Are you ready to face the sun-scorched landscape of Australia’s Red Centre?

• New scenario: “Pioneering spirit” (1830-1930)
• Map expansion: “Down Under” (available in Free Game and Sandbox modes)
• 3 new historical engines: Heisler (0-8-0), C30 (4-6-0) and Class S (4-6-2)
• New tradeable goods (eg. seafood, Rail-O-Mite and canned beer) and 52 new cities to discover
• New music tracks, reworked city buildings and unique mission structures (eg. Sydney Harbour Bridge)
• New Settlement feature unique to the “Down Under” map: on pre-determined locations, players can now establish new cities and this way arrange the economic system to their liking

70050000023062.name: Banner of the Maid - The Oriental Pirate
70050000023062.description:
While on a reconnaissance mission with Lannes, Pauline accidentally boarded a British warship. Just as they are about to be found by enemies on board, a strange figure appeared in the cabin...
Mu Zhiyun, the oriental pirate who serves under Ching Shih, sailed across the oceans to Europe with certain purpose.
The DLC contains 5 challenge missions:
1. You can receive the new quest "The Oriental Pirate" in the salon. Complete the mission to be rewarded with funds and items, and unlock a new character: Mu Zhiyun. She leads the Pirates, a new unit equipped with a variety of weapons, has unique skills and seeks treasures on the battlefield.
2. When you finish Chapter 18 of the main campaign, a new quest line "A Sailor's Gossip" will be gradually unlocked. NOTE: You'll need Thérèse in your army to unlock "A Sailor's Gossip, Chapter 3".

70050000023088.name: 3000th Duel: The Wise Ones
70050000023088.intro: The end of an epic adventure to reveal the secret of destiny.
70050000023088.description:
In this newly expanded world, horrifying enemies await to challenge you! 

● New adventure regions added.
Over 150 new regions added: including cold snowfields, underwater locations, burning lava, time-transcended worlds and 60+ types of new monsters. 

● New Equipment and Occults 
New equipment, skills and Occults have been added along with new adventure regions and expanded levels.

● New Gameplus Mode 
Your journey isn't over yet.
Play the New Gameplus Mode for a deeper adventure with stronger enemies!

70050000023099.name: Experience x3 - Liege Dragon
70050000023099.description:
All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000023100.name: No Encounters - Liege Dragon
70050000023100.description:
Enables the feature to configure the encounter rate.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000023101.name: Damage x2 - Liege Dragon
70050000023101.description:
Damage dealt to enemies is doubled.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000023102.name: Full Restore - Liege Dragon
70050000023102.description:
All characters' HP/MP are fully recovered after battle.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000023103.name: Digital Deluxe Edition
70050000023103.description:
For the first 3 weeks following the release of the game, get the Digital Deluxe Edition for free!
The Bluecoats: North & South Digital Deluxe Edition pack contains alternative content for the main game:
- golden rifle skin for your weapon during FPS sequences
- alternative music playing on the strategic map

70050000023117.name: Monster Hunter Rise Deluxe Kit
70050000023117.description:
- "Kamurai" Hunter layered armor set
- "Shuriken Collar" Palamute layered armor piece
- "Fish Collar" Palico layered armor piece
- 4 gestures
- Samurai pose set
- Kabuki face paint
- "Izuchi Tail" hairstyle

70050000023127.name: Banner of the Maid - Miss Elisa's Journal
70050000023127.description:
As the riot in Paris came to the end, people wants to know the truth behind that series of things. Our brave journalist Miss Elisa decides to take a risk to solve the mysteries around Pauline Bonaparte.
This DLC contains 5 new stages with high difficulty, and you can find them at salon after you clear all Main Quests.

70050000023130.name: Zombie Invasion Mode
70050000023130.description:
CONTENT
Does NOT include any table and customization unlocks.

This DLC unlocks Zombie Invasion mode.

DESCRIPTION
Zombie Invasion! The mode where brain fluid polishes the steel ball!

FEATURES
In this survivor mode you have to survive through hordes of zombies on a uniquely designed pinball table. Strike them with thunder, rockets and many other special attacks to defend yourself against the Zombie Invasion!

70050000023145.name: Creeper Mask + Outfit
70050000023145.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of the Creeper from the Minecraft series is now available. This is for Mii Brawlers, so unleash punches and kicks that can be seen only in Smash! Fill your opponents with fear as you take on the appearance of this dreaded green terror!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Creeper Mask
・ Creeper Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000023146.name: Pig Mask + Outfit
70050000023146.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of the Pig from the Minecraft series is now available! The cute eyes, nose, and that piggy frame all call back to the original game. As a Mii Brawler, deliver a fierce (pork) chop to your opponents!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Pig Mask
・ Pig Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000023147.name: Diamond Helmet + Armor
70050000023147.description:
A Mii Fighter costume of the Diamond Armor from the Minecraft series is now available for Mii Swordfighters! With the sturdy Diamond Armor equipped and trusty Diamond Sword in hand, bring the battle to your opponents, and see who will survive the night!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Diamond Helmet
・ Diamond Armor (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000023148.name: Travis Wig + Outfit
70050000023148.description:
A Mii Swordfighter costume of Travis from the NO MORE HEROES series is now available! You'll fight with his treasured Beam Katana, as any swordfighter should! The costume comes with sunglasses and a tiger-print jacket so you can strike your foes down in style.

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Travis Wig
・ Travis Outfit (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000023149.name: Bomberman Mask + Outfit
70050000023149.description:
A Mii Brawler costume of Bomberman from the Bomberman series is now available! Unlike Assist Trophy Bomberman, this one is for fighters who like to get up close and personal. His colour is determined by the colour of the Mii used. Pick whatever suits your fancy!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Bomberman Mask
・ Bomberman Outfit (for Brawlers)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000023150.name: Gil's Helmet + Armor
70050000023150.description:
A Mii Swordfighter costume of Gil from The Tower of Druaga series is now available! Adorn yourself with Gil's mighty golden armour that turns courage into strength, and embrace his unbreakable will to climb to new and heady heights!

Contents

Mii Fighter Costume
・ Gil's Helmet
・ Gil's Armor (for Swordfighters)

Usable after purchase by going to Games & More → Mii Fighter.

70050000023214.name: Northgard - Nidhogg, Clan of the Dragon
70050000023214.description:
Description

The most alien of all clans, the Dragons follow ancient customs and embrace freakish traditions. They use sacrifice and oppression to further their goals, often earning the distrust of the other Clans.

Starting Bonus

- Your civilians can go into neutral territory.
- No Happiness or Production penalty for being wounded.
- You start with a Sacrificial Pyre. You can build a Dragonkin Altar instead of other military buildings.
- You start with 2 Thralls. You can buy thralls from your Longship Dock

Oppression

Oppression is an important aspect of the clan’s economy. Their thralls, like regular civilians, can travel in neutral territory, carry out basic tasks and fight..
Thralls can be purchased from your longship dock and after getting the Capture Lore, you’ll be able to oppress other faction's people.
But if by any chance your regular population falls under your Thrall population, they will rise against you!

Sacrifices and Dragon Essence Gauge

The Clan of the Dragon starts each game with an already built exclusive building: the Sacrificial Pyre. You can use this building to sacrifice your people in order to honor the gods and gain their favors, unlocking various bonuses!

Dragonkin and their Altar

The only military camp you’ll be able to build is the Dragonkin Altar where you can create Dragonkins, ferocious military units, that are far more powerful than warriors.

70050000023233.name: FIFA 21 In-Game Commentary – Arabic
70050000023233.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 21.

70050000023234.name: FIFA 21 In-Game Commentary – Polish
70050000023234.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 21.

70050000023235.name: FIFA 21 In-Game Commentary – Russian
70050000023235.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 21.

70050000023236.name: FIFA 21 In-Game Commentary – Portuguese (Brazil)
70050000023236.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 21.

70050000023237.name: FIFA 21 In-Game Commentary – Dutch
70050000023237.intro: A legacy in football excellence in FIFA 21.

70050000023254.name: Don't Starve: Hamlet Nintendo Switch Edition
70050000023254.description:
In Don’t Starve: Hamlet Nintendo Switch Edition, Wilson discovers a lost town of aristocratic Pigmen nestled within a foreboding tropical jungle.

Can you readjust to society as an outsider? Can you earn fame and riches recovering lost relics? Will you weather the Aporkalypse?

Key Features
-Reacquaint to city life: Visit shops and trade with the pig society. Purchase and renovate your own home.
-Delve into ancient ruins: Explore the lost world of an ancient pig civilization filled with traps and try your hand at treasure hunting.
-Explore new lands: Discover the secrets of new wild life and seasons.
-Craft and experiment with new items: Find new ingredients and recipes to solve new problems.

Three new characters
-Wilba: Daughter to Queen Malfalfa, Princess Wilba has the love of her people. If only she wanted the job.
-Wormwood: Who knows where this creature of nature came from, but he'll likely grow on you.
-Wheeler: A gutsy aeronaut whose latest adventure has blown off course.

70050000023261.name: DokiDoki Pants set A
70050000023261.description:
Four types of Panty have been added: Gingham Check Panty, Sukeban, Leather Panty and Witch.
As a player character you'll be able to use them in the Story, Arcade, Multiplayer, Local, Online modes.

Gingham Check Panty (CV Hoshitani Mio)
Sukeban (CV Tazawa Masumi)
Leather Panty (CV Kawamura Rie)
Witch (CV Sakuragi Tsugumi)

70050000023283.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! "DEEMO Pack"
70050000023283.description:
Get access to this additionnal content:

- Saika
- Leviathan
- Wish upon a shooting star
- MagiCatz
- ANiMA

70050000023284.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! "Late Night Anime Pack Vol.2"
70050000023284.description:
Get access to this additionnal content:

- Gomakashi
- Aozora No RHAPSODY
- Paradisus-Paradoxum
- Rising Hope
- only my railgun

70050000023285.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum'n'Fun! - Song "BORN ON DREAM! ~HANABI☆NIGHT~"
70050000023285.description: Get access to this additionnal song

70050000023314.name: Hit Song + VTuber Pack
70050000023314.intro: A new pack featuring 10 songs, a navigator, and avatars from J-POP, ANIME, VTuber!
70050000023314.description:
A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 songs, a navigator, and avatars from J-POP, ANIME, VTuber!

This pack includes the following content.
■Song Pack (10 songs)
・God knows…
・only my railgun
・The Kōga Ninja Scrolls *Locked Song
・Gokuraku Jodo
・Yoru ni Kakeru
・Hibari
・Shiny Smily Story
・Tatake Tatake Tee Tatake
・-A.I.D-
・Yumemiru Sorae

■Navigator
・Natsuiro Mtsuri *with voice
・Shirakami Fubuki *with voice


■Avatar
・MATSURI(2D)
・FUBUKI(2D)
・NoA(2D)
・Io(2D)
・mana(2D)

*Some content will be unlocked via missions after downloading.

70050000023316.name: Rain
70050000023316.description: Growing up an orphan, Rain had limited prospects. To overcome them, he joined Edenia's army. His strategic genius earned him great fame and quick promotion. Rain used his new position to seek out his birth parents' true identities. He was shocked to learn that he was the bastard son of the god Argus, Edenia's Protector. Argus had given Rain away, and hidden his parentage, to avoid both shame and scandal. Now, armed with the knowledge that he's a half god, Rain battles for his place in Edenia's pantheon. If it's not given to him, he'll take it by force.

70050000023317.name: Mileena
70050000023317.description: Mileena is the product of Shang Tsung's diabolical cloning experiments: the perfect blend of Tarkatan ferocity and Kitana's athletic grace. Brought forward in the timeline by Kronika, Mileena has learned of her tragic future: her brief reign as Outworld's Empress and her death at the hands of D'Vorah and Kotal Kahn. Determined to regain her throne, Mileena has begun Outworld's civil war anew. Her enemies will submit, or they will die.

70050000023318.name: Rambo
70050000023318.description: John J. Rambo is a former United States Special Forces soldier deeply haunted by his time in Vietnam. He is rough, aggressive and is well known for entering exceptionally dangerous situations alone. Now, as an Army of One, Rambo has reactivated his ruthless fighting skills to infiltrate the Mortal Kombat universe, using raw violence against any Kombatant who dares to stand in his way.

70050000023331.name: Late Stage Illmatic Outfit for Dice
70050000023331.description:
When Dice was caught by the Shine City Police in the Sewage Facility he was forced to make his escape by dropping straight down into the pipes. Now, the Sewage Facility doesn't just contain simple waste water. Full of unspeakable toxins and experimental bacteria, Dice soon lost consciousness. Some time passed and in a stroke of luck, Latch detected his lifeless body on his Robo-Sub's sonar. While in Latch's care, Dice bandaged his own diseased skin and quickly fled into the darkness as if possessed by some primal instinct. He was spotted destroying his long time rival Doombox in a match not long after.

- The Late Stage Illmatic colorway. An ancient Egyptian inspired design with a streetwear twist, blue skin and gold accents.
- The Lethal Infection colorway. The alternate 'cursed' version with maroon bandages, and even more gold.

70050000023338.name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Eldfjall Island
70050000023338.intro: Eldfjall - a completely new Lonely Mountain for you to explore!
70050000023338.description:
Pack your raincoat and bring your beloved bike to the volcanic island of Eldfjall - the largest Lonely Mountain yet.

Features:

4 new trails with new challenges and resting spots await you
New special effects: ride through the thunderstorm or find your way down an erupting volcano. 
Satisfy your inner viking and unlock unique outfits, helmets, and paint jobs
Upgrade your existing outfits with the new pro helmet
Complete your fashion style with new unlockable backpacks
Make your name famous on the leaderboards
 
Eldfjall - a new Lonely Mountain for you to explore!

70050000023342.name: Classic Duke & Classic Cobra Commander Character Pack
70050000023342.description: Gain two new character skins based on the iconic 80’s cartoon. This pack grants access to Classic Duke and Classic Cobra Commander.

70050000023351.name: Edahi & Dohai
70050000023351.intro: 20 brand new levels in search of the first two guardians.
70050000023351.description:
The prison that contains the shadows has become very weak and they are trying to escape. Only The Three Guardians can repair it but they have been polluted by the evil springing up from the cracks in the Seal.

Find the first two guardians —Edahi and Dohai— and release them from the shadows in 20 brand new levels featuring new enemies, game mechanics and challenges, in addition to two mighty enemy bosses.

70050000023356.name: Battle Gear: G.I. Joe & Cobra Weapons Pack
70050000023356.description: This pack includes a total of 12 new weapon skins which are comprised of six gold skins for the Cobra forces and six chrome skins for the G.I. Joe forces.

70050000023365.name: Cosmic Founder Pack
70050000023365.description:
Blast further into the cosmos with this Legendary skin pack for HyperBrawl Tournament.
This pack includes:
- 2 Legendary skins for Lysander
- 2 Legendary skins for Go-Zen
- 2 Legendary skins for Shade
- 2 Legendary skins for Brawlbot
Note: To equip these skins the applicable hero must be unlocked in-game. Unlocking Heroes is free and achieved through gameplay.

70050000023366.name: Warrior Founder Pack
70050000023366.description:
Unleash your inner warrior with this Legendary skin pack for HyperBrawl Tournament.
This pack includes:
- 2 Legendary skins for Toro
- 2 Legendary skins for Sir Gallant
- 2 Legendary skins for Rune
- 2 Legendary skins for Ti
Note: To equip these skins the applicable hero must be unlocked in-game. Unlocking Heroes is free and achieved through gameplay.

70050000023367.name: Celebration Pack 1
70050000023367.description:
Showcase your goalscoring abilities with the first Legendary Goal Blaze and Ball Trail pack for HyperBrawl Tournament.
This pack includes:
- 5 Legendary Goal Blazes
- 5 Legendary Ball Trails

70050000023368.name: Celebration Pack 2
70050000023368.description:
Showcase your goalscoring abilities with the second Legendary Goal Blaze and Ball Trail pack for HyperBrawl Tournament.
This pack includes:
- 5 Legendary Goal Blazes
- 5 Legendary Ball Trails

70050000023374.name: Digital Art Book & Soundtrack
70050000023374.description: Gain access to the full length music tracks from game which can be played from a custom menu. Plus get access to nine bonus tracks from the 80’s cartoon.

70050000023375.name: Borderlands 2: Commander Lilith & the Fight for Sanctuary
70050000023375.description: Return to the award-winning shooter-looter for an all-new adventure that sets the stage for Borderlands 3. Sanctuary is under siege, the Vault Map has been stolen, and a toxic gas is poisoning Pandora. Battle new bosses, explore new areas, collect new loot (including an entirely new tier beyond Legendary), and join up with Lilith and the Crimson Raiders to take on a deranged villain hell-bent on ruling the planet.

70050000023400.name: Cardpocalypse: Out of Time
70050000023400.description:
Out of Time is a standalone adventure set within the final day of Jess' first week at her new school. On the verge of saving the world, Jess encounters Tock, the time-traveling Pipsqueak champion. Tock hurls Jess back in time, trapping her in a time loop where she is forced to relive the same school day over and over again like she was some sort of giant marmot. To add insult to injury, Jess loses her decks in the time-traveling process. Magically, Jess finds a brand new champion card in her pocket. It's Bloop! Bloop is the only neutral champion in the game, a known weakling in the Mega Mutant Power Pets realm, but perhaps Jess can do something about that? Now Jess and Bloop must join forces to defeat Tock, get out of the time loop, and get back to saving the world!

• A whole new standalone campaign! Build your collection and change the rules once more.
• Test your card gaming skills against a series of new enemy champions.
• Stuck in a time loop? Have some fun!
• Find new combos! Bloop, a special neutral champion can use cards from every faction. 
• Build the Champion you want. Bloop has a unique upgrade tree to explore.
• Find brand new Power Pets cards!
• Bloop and all the new cards are also added to Gauntlet mode for endless possibilities!

70050000023403.name: Round Hammer Particle Cannon
70050000023403.description:
This DLC includes a multiplayer mecha: Round Hammer Particle Cannon.
Round Hammer Particle Cannon can only be used in Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer and Training.

Round Hammer Particle Cannon is a model modiﬁed to test the Siege Cannon model. It retains the original heavy armor, but lacks mobility. Also, to prevent the test data being used by enemies, it also comes with a self-destruction system.

Primary Weapon (Normal Mode) - Particle Shotgun
Heavy Particle Cannon spread ﬁring mode.

Secondary Weapon - Shock Wave
Release high-power particles to the front to knockback the enemy.

Light Melee - Graphite Scrambler
Forms temporary electric shock to temporarily disrupt the movement of the enemy.

Heavy Melee - Self-destruction System
Detonates an explosion with a large eﬀective radius to destroy test data.

Primay Weapon (Sniper Mode) - Heavy Particle Cannon
Giving up mobility, sets up the shield and transforms into a turret.

70050000023404.name: Shepherd Jäger & Morris
70050000023404.description:
This DLC includes a multiplayer mecha "Shepherd Jäger" and a multiplayer pilot "Morris Yasir".
Shepherd Jäger & Morris can only be used in Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer and Training.

【Mecha】
Shepherd Jäger is a model with its melee attack strengthened around its sabre.

Primary Weapon - Throwing Knife
Throws a high speed dagger to disrupt the enemy.

Secondary Weapon - Shoulder Vulcan
Fires two vulcans on the shoulder at the same time.

Light Melee - Iaido Combo Slash
Performs a 2 hit combo slash.

Heavy Melee - Iaido Heavy Slash
Performs a heavy slash.

Shepherd Jäger and Morris Yasir can only be used in Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer and Training.

【Pilot】
Morris is the captain of Hardcore Defense Corp., a stoic warrior and sword master, equipped with pistol, rocket launcher and katana.

70050000023405.name: Graeme & Vulphaes
70050000023405.description:
This DLC includes a multiplayer mecha "Graeme" and a multiplayer pilot "Vulphaes Bonaparte".
Graeme and Vulphaes Bonaparte can only be used in Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer and Training.

【Mecha】
Modified Golem adjusted to the feature of the pilot, suitable for melee combat. The ride for Vulphaes Bonaparte.

Primary Weapon - Dagger Attack
Launches quick attack with AT Dagger

Secondary Weapon - Chest Vulcan
Small caliber vulcan gun.

Light Melee - Martial Arts
Performs 2 combo melee strike

Heavy Melee - Iaido Heavy Slash
Loads HE round then performs a large scale strafing.

Light Melee(Battle Damaged) - Ram
Performs a tackle.

Secondary Weapon(Battle Damaged) - Chest Vulcan
Small caliber vulcan gun.

Defend/Transform
None.

【Pilot】
Vulphaes is the ACE Pilot of Musbel, a wild red-hair merc who is very good with guns and knives.

70050000023406.name: Mecha Painting Set 1
70050000023406.description:
This DLC contains 5 different mechas' paintings.
Paintings can only be used in Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer and Training.

・Thunderbolt, Painting "Wish of Edgar"
・Crimson Flame, Painting "Black Iron Fortress"
・Geier EVOL, "Psychological Warfare"
・Knell A3, Painting "Giant Rise"
・Round Hammer Siege Cannon, Painting "Red Brick"

70050000023407.name: Pilot Pack 1
70050000023407.description:
This DLC includes 3 multiplayer pilots: Tarethur O'Connell, Edgar Fieldbach and Aylatanya Kiruna.
Tarethur O'Connell, Edgar Fieldbach and Aylatanya Kiruna can only be used in Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer and Training.

【Tarethur O'Connell】
Tarethur O'Connell is an ACE pilot for Hardcore Defense Corp., a merc with a simple but eﬀective combat style, equipped with pistol, grenade and combat dagger.

【Edgar Fieldbach】
Edgar is a support pilot of Hardcore Defense Corps., an outgoing robot anime fan, excellent in penetrating weak spot of the enemy, equipped with SMG and grenade.

【Aylatanya Kiruna】
Lt. Aylatanya, a vigorous and speedy UNF intel oﬃcer, good at jamming enemies, equipped with pistol, jamming grenade and grapple gun.

70050000023408.name: Thunderbolt Otome
70050000023408.description:
This DLC includes a multiplayer mecha "Thunderbolt Otome".
Thunderbolt Otome can only be used in Local Multiplayer, Online Multiplayer and Training.

Created by simulation battle developers in private, according to their preferences. Although it has exactly the same performance as the original Thunderbolt, it unexpectedly increased the pilot’s moral.

Primary Weapon - Beam Rifle
Fires a semi-automatic beam rifle.

Secondary Weapon - Chest Vulcan
Small caliber vulcan gun.

Light Melee - Energy Blade
Slashes with the arm-mounted Energy Blades. Can perform a three-hit combo.

Heavy Melee - Shield Shock
Blasts the enemy with an electric shock. Press again to release another pulse.

Defend/Transform
Uses a shield to block attacks from the front.

70050000023413.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! "VOCALOID™ Music Pack Vol. 6 "
70050000023413.description:
Get access to this additional content:

- Violence Trigger
-  Tell Your World
- BLACK★ROCKSHOOTER
- NINJIN NIN
- HANA OTO URABYOUSHI

70050000023414.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! "Donder Pack -Juvenile-"
70050000023414.description:
Get access to this additional content:

- CYBERgenicALICE
- Cross Blue
- TSUKIKAGE SASURAI
- BE THE ACE
- ∫-integral-

70050000023415.name: Ninjala Story Pack: Chapter Two
70050000023415.intro: A new offering allowing you to enjoy the story of Ninjala offline!
70050000023415.description:
Complete ninja missions to earn a host of special items!
Story Mode is a single-player mode that can be experienced offline.
Enjoy a tale of ninja intrigue told through dynamic graphic novel-style cut scenes and intense action sequences. In the action sequences, you'll track down and do battle with sinister space ninja along with other missions. The final stage features a thrilling battle against a giant robot that will test your ninja skills to the max!
■ Special Items
The Ninjala Story Pack: Chapter Two will give players the opportunity to earn exclusive rewards not obtainable anywhere else.
■ The Story
Berecca is sent to the city of Oedo by Master Genryusai on a top-secret ninja mission.
There, she comes across Leonard, a man who supposedly died in an accident years ago along with her father.
“Does this mean...Dad could also be alive!?”
Berecca chases after Leonard, not realizing that she’s about to embroil herself in a dark conspiracy...

70050000023419.name: Skill Battle Booster Pack
70050000023419.intro: Don't miss exclusive Sonic the Hedgehog-themed Item Cards
70050000023419.description: Boost your strategy and power your team in Puyo Puyo Tetris 2's brand-new Skill Battle mode with this pack of rare Item Cards--including 3 special cards featuring items from the Sonic the Hedgehog series! This pack is exclusive to the Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 Launch Edition. Get it before it's gone!

70050000023435.name: DokiDoki Pants set B
70050000023435.description:
Four types of Panty have been added: Camouflage Panty, Kunoichi, Succubus and Princess.
As a player character you'll be able to use them in the Story, Arcade, Multiplayer, Local, Online modes.

Camouflage Panty (CV Maruyama Miki)
Kunoichi (CV Kaho Narumi)

70050000023534.name: Lobbyistico
70050000023534.description:
What do the European Union and corruption have in common? Nothing of course, since the EU is as pure as a drop of the finest Tropican rum. So why not run a field study and get to know more about this curious political entity? And why not run it in Tropico, which is so famously governed by corrupt politicians (except for El Presidente, of course)? Join the EU in their investigations into 'corruptionomics' and unlock new powerful perks in ‘Lobbyistico’ for Tropico 6. 
Corruption lies at the heart of the Lobbyistico DLC. Invite faction leaders as lobbyists into the El Presidente Club and conduct backroom politics to unlock a unique new set of perks to boost your economy and manipulate your faction standings. But with increased lobby work comes increased corruption, which will impact on the wider Tropican economy and society. 
Fight the spread of corruption - or, let’s be honest, just try to cover everything up - using the new Corruption Agency. Enjoy more new content with two new traits, three new music tracks and a fetching new set of customization items for El Prez and the palace. 


Features:
• New corruption gameplay mechanic: Use lobby work to gain access to new perks to boost your economy while trying to balance the resulting corruption, which will ruin your island paradise with negative effects if left unchecked.  
• 3 new buildings: Get some dirty lobbying work done in the El Presidente Club, where statesmen can discuss affairs of state in seclusion and secrecy. Use the Corruption Agency to cover everything up and invite faction leaders to stay at the Official Residence in exchange for political favors. 
• 2 new traits: Polarizing, All For The Folk
• 3 new tracks: Viva la Corrupción, Fiesta en el Club, Bruselas está Bailando
• 4 new customization options for El Prez and the palace as well as 3 new sandbox maps

70050000023569.name: Here's to the Birthday Boy!: Minato
70050000023569.description: Minato's birthday is the 1st of August! What will you do to make him say, "This was the best birthday ever, but I want one more thing: you."?

70050000023570.name: Here's to the Birthday Boy! Kaoru
70050000023570.description: Kaoru's birthday is the 12th of November! You're preparing a surprise for your beloved when he says, "Make those expressions only for me." Kaoru showers you with affection in return! It's sure to be a wonderful day for both!

70050000023571.name: Here's to the Birthday Boy!: Shusei
70050000023571.description: Shusei's birthday is the 1st of September! But will a sudden business trip ruin your plans, or make this the best birthday ever? Special birthday image included!

70050000023572.name: Here's to the Birthday Boy!: Akiyoshi
70050000023572.description: It's Akiyoshi's birthday on the 20th of May! You have it all planned out until he says... "Let's have fun all night long." The birthday boy knows EXACTLY what he wants!

70050000023573.name: Don't Tell Him I'm Popular!: Minato
70050000023573.description: You're living with all of Seasonelle now, and finding time to be with Minato is harder than ever! Then one day, Minato sees you with Tsumugu... Will you be able to resist Tsumugu's charms and keep Minato as your one and only?

70050000023574.name: After the Crisis: Minato
70050000023574.description: Living with all these blokes never bothered you much, but Minato sees them for who they are! How will he show you he's the only one worthy of your love?

70050000023582.description:

70050000023583.name: Full Restore - Dragon Lapis
70050000023583.description:

Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000023584.name: No Skill Cost - Dragon Lapis
70050000023584.description:
Skills no longer consume MP in battles.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

With this add-on, you have all the cool brushes to help you in your artistic process: wiggle brush, rainbow pencil, mop, dot pen, shape maker, square brush, text tool and more.

Froshmin can also use all colors: white, yellow, pink, blue and more.

Now go and paint like there's no tomorrow!

70050000023602.name: Later Daters Part 2
70050000023602.intro: Choose what happens next at the Oceanview Living Domicile for the Elderly, and smooch some sexy seniors.
70050000023602.description:
Something is brewing at Ye OLDE… is the happy family of friends you’ve made headed for splitsville? It’s up to you to keep everyone together or bring on the drama. Whatever you choose, you’re in for a helluva ride.

Includes Episodes 4-7!

70050000023631.name: Crystal Void Theme Pack
70050000023631.description:
From the creators of Rock Band™ and Dance Central™ comes FUSER™ - a non-stop digital music festival where you control the music! Combine elements of the world’s most popular songs to create your own sound or partner with friends on epic collaborations, then share your amazing mixes and headlining performances with the world! #PlayFUSER

FUSER Features

- Play with a library of over 100 songs including tracks from the world’s top artists
- Complete challenges to unlock new skills and content in Campaign play
- Explore, discover, and create incredible mixes and custom effects in Freestyle play
- Collaborate or Compete in Multiplayer with players from around the world
- Customisation options to tailor the look and feel to your unique individual style
- Share your inspired mixes and mind-blowing performances in-game and online

70050000023632.name: Depixtion: Halloween
70050000023632.intro: Depixtion: Halloween is a chilling expansion for the puzzle game Depixtion, in which you create grotesque works of art using logic.
70050000023632.description:
By blending color mixing mechanics with the rules of nonograms, Depixtion: Halloween is a uniquely colorful, and horrifying experience.

Features:
- 50 Cursed Depixtion Images - 150 Haunted Nonogram Puzzles
- Horrifying puzzles of all sizes: 4x4, 8x8, 12x12, 16x16, 20x20, and 24x24
- Spookier color palette. Now with 100% more Grey!
- Accessibility Options. Every Ghoul deserves a chance to play!

70050000023779.description:

- Shrimpster 
- Atomic
- Sparkle  
Each skin comes with the signature special trick and the matching style paint job. 
Ride on!

- Cyberguy

Each skin comes with the signature special trick and the matching style paint job.

70050000023795.name: IMMORTALS FENYX RISING - BONUS QUEST
70050000023795.description: Pre-order now for a bonus quest, A Tale of Fire and Lightning, and discover the story of Helios and Phaeton.

70050000023796.name: IMMORTALS FENYX RISING - A New god
70050000023796.description: As Fenyx, overcome the trials of the gods of Olympos to join the Greek Pantheon and fulfill your destiny.

70050000023799.name: IMMORTALS FENYX RISING - The Lost gods
70050000023799.description: Experience a new brawler-style of combat in a top-down view! Meet a new hero embarking on an epic adventure to reunite the Greek gods.

70050000023801.name: IMMORTALS FENYX RISING - Myths of the Eastern Realm
70050000023801.description: Play a brand new story inspired by Chinese mythology, where you'll encounter new gods and fight exotic monsters in a distant land, as a new hero.

70050000023821.name: Salad Bar Tycoon Expansion Pack 1
70050000023821.intro: New challanges are waiting for you!
70050000023821.description:
IN THIS EXPANSION PACK FOR SALAD BAR TYCOON YOU WILL FIND:

• 30 new levels to explore
• 6 new Achievements to complete

Go ahead, test your skill!

70050000023824.name: Salad Bar Tycoon Expansion Pack 2
70050000023824.intro: New challanges are waiting for you!
70050000023824.description:
IN THIS EXPANSION PACK FOR SALAD BAR TYCOON YOU WILL FIND:

• 30 new levels to explore
• 6 new Achievements to complete

Go ahead, test your skill!

70050000023827.name: Persona®5 Strikers Persona Legacy BGM
70050000023827.description:
The Persona® 5 Strikers Legacy BGM includes battle tracks from:
•	Persona 1 and Persona 1 PSP remake
•	Persona 2: Innocent Sin and Persona 2: Eternal Punishment
•	Persona 3 and Persona 3 Portable
•	Persona 4 and Persona 4 Golden
Join the Phantom Thieves and strike back against the corruption overtaking cities across Japan. A summer vacation with close friends takes a sudden turn as a distorted reality emerges; reveal the truth and redeem the hearts of those imprisoned at the center of the crisis! 
	
•	Jump into the stylish world of Persona in an all-new story 
•	Dynamically control your team during explosive combat 
•	Battle across Japan in an epic road trip

70050000023828.name: Persona®5 Strikers All-Out Attack Pack
70050000023828.description:
The Persona® Strikers All-Out Attack Pack includes:
•	Boost Skills Pack
•	Basic Affinity Pack
•	Armor Pack
•	10K Persona points
•	Enemy Debuff Skills Pack
•	Ally Buff SkillS Pack

Join the Phantom Thieves and strike back against the corruption overtaking cities across Japan. A summer vacation with close friends takes a sudden turn as a distorted reality emerges; reveal the truth and redeem the hearts of those imprisoned at the center of the crisis! 
•	Jump into the stylish world of Persona in an all-new story 
•	Dynamically control your team during explosive combat 
•	Battle across Japan in an epic road trip

70050000023837.name: Barbarian
70050000023837.description: The life of a barbarian is simple. A good club, a worn armor, an enemy on the horizon and a friendly army behind your back. Just remember not to mention your two doctorates and philosophy course. This barbarian has forgotten about it and now has to command in every battle – and it is not that easy.

70050000023838.name: Fairy
70050000023838.description:
There is nothing sweeter than a fairy that fulfills the wishes... especially her own. This particular one decided that birthday balls and buffalo dresses weren’t her thing – instead, she went to the battlefield to sow chaos and destroy her opponents. See how armies fall to their knees because of her personal charm and the extremely dangerous cute wand with the star.

In her spare time, she collects hats.

70050000023839.name: Elf
70050000023839.description:
Forests, mountains and lakes have no secrets from her, and on the battlefield she is buzzing like a dragon among the clouds. But it’s better not to send her to the baker for blueberry buns, because she can come home after a year with a new army at her side. And worst of all, no buns. A peaceful life is just not what she does best.

And she speaks a language that no one understands.

70050000023840.name: Ghost
70050000023840.description: His goal is simple: to turn every clash into a thrilling party. He loves feasts, great music and scary castles, so friends often besiege his fortress to make him happy. Or at least he thinks of them as friends... Noisy, armed to the teeth and running away very quickly when he tries to hug them. One thing is certain – he is the true soul of the party.

70050000023841.name: Dwarf
70050000023841.description:
This dwarf has nerves of steel, but a heart of gold. That is why he’s a commander adored by everyone – not counting his opponents of course. 

After a battle, he puts down his axe and sets off to operas, hoping that the world will also be conquered by his voice. The effects... well... let's say that his songs can be considered the ultimate weapon.

70050000023856.name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! "UUUM Pack"
70050000023856.description:
Get access to this additionnal content:

- Ima
- HIMAWARI HAPPY 
- JOIN US

70050000023857.name: Summer Fashion Costume Set
70050000023857.intro: Experience a new summer adventure in summer fashion!
70050000023857.description:
“Summer Fashion Costume Set” that will feature 7 costumes in total, one for each of the following characters: Ryza, Lent, Tao, Klaudia, Patricia, Serri, and Clifford.

[Costumes featured]
Ryza: Sea Breeze Blouse
Klaudia: Light Summer Heat
Lent: Journeying Under the Sun
Tao: Summer Camp
Patricia: Formal Summer Dress
Clifford: Hunter's Holiday
Serri: Oren's Short Summer

Note: 
- All costumes can be changed in the “Changing Room” accessible through the desk in the Atelier. Characters need to join the party before their costumes can be changed.
- Items featured in this set may be sold separately at a later date.
- Please visit the official website for more information on the featured content: https://www.koeitecmoeurope.com/ryza2/

70050000023863.description:
Get access to this additionnal content:

- Csardas!
- Night Jazz Opera 9 No. 2
- Pupper Waltz

70050000024101.name: Gurren Lagann
70050000024101.intro: Your drill is the drill that will pierce the heavens!
70050000024101.description:
This DLC contains Gurren-Lagann, Lagann and pilot Simon. The DLC supports Local & Online Multiplayer Mode, Training Mode and Single-player Simulation Mode.
*To unlock Simulation Mode by completing Campaign Mode.

【Mecha】
The main mecha of Team Gurren. It is a Gunmen with high explosive power, which can construct all sorts of unique weapons using its Spiral Power.

Primary Weapon - Gurren Boomerang
Throws a pair of sunglasses from its chest.

Secondary Weapon - Giga Drill Break
Gurren Lagann's ultimate attack creating a gigantic drill with explosive power.

Light Melee - Skull Break
Attacks x4 combo attack, but can only be used on the ground.

Light Melee - Fire Cart Kick
Kicks towards the ground, but can only be used midair.

Heavy Melee - Full Drillized
Drills burst out from its body, attacking surrounding enemies.

Light Melee(Lagann) - Tackle

Secondary Weapon(Lagann) - Lagann Impact

【Pilot】
A boy called "Digging Simon". He found a small drill while digging a hole, and it will change his destiny…

70050000024192.name: Urban Flow - Winter Expansion Pack
70050000024192.intro: Winter has come to Urban Flow!
70050000024192.description:
Christmas Flow is the best flow!  

Help Santa bring Christmas gifts to the people of Urban City! 

Enjoy two new vehicles - the firetruck and snow plow!
Play 20 new levels!
Enjoy the winter theme and new music!

70050000024210.name: DEEMO x DJMAX collaboration pack
70050000024210.description:
The following five tracks are included.

glory day (Deemo Arr.)
Far East Princess (Deemo Arr.)
OBLIVION (Deemo Arr.)
Heart of Witch (Deemo Arr.)
Nightmare (Deemo Arr.)

70050000024212.name: IMMORTALS FENYX RISING - When the Road Gets Rocky
70050000024212.description: Receive the bonus quest - "When the Road Gets Rocky" - and earn dedicated in-game rewards when you purchase the season pass today.

70050000024223.name: Pupipupi Bunta -Siberian Husky with a Peaceful Face-
70050000024223.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". 
This is a collection of 10 puzzle images of Pupi Pupi Bunta, a Siberian Husky who is popular on social media in Japan for his always peaceful face.

70050000024225.name: Little otter　Takechiyo＆Aoi
70050000024225.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". 
This is a collection of 10 puzzle images of Takechiyo and Aoi, the popular otter on social media in Japan.

70050000024227.name: Masterpieces of World  - Pre-Raphaelites & their Successors -
70050000024227.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
- Ophelia / John Everett Millais
- Christ in the House of His Parents / John Everett Millais
- The North-West Passage  / John Everett Millais
- A Dream Of The Past: Sir Isumbras At The Ford  / John Everett Millais
- May Morning on Magdalen Tower / William Holman Hunt
- The Scapegoat / William Holman Hunt
- The Hireling Shepherd / William Holman Hunt
- Love Among the Ruins / Edward Burne-Jones
- The Last Sleep of Arthur in Avalon / Edward Burne-Jones
- The Lady of Shalott / John William Waterhouse

70050000024229.name: Beautiful Sceneries in Japan
70050000024229.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
- Kabira Bay, Ishigaki Island, Okinawa
- Otome Waterfall, Nasushiobara, Tochigi
- Mt.Fuji seen from Lake Kawaguchi, Yamanashi
- Tsunoshima Bridge, Yamaguchi
- Ice Rimes in Zao, Yamagata
- Takachiho Gorge, Miyazaki
- Ogasawara Islands, Tokyo
- Lake Okushima and Akasawa Bridge, Gunma
- Nikobuchi, Kochi
- Chichibugahama, Kagawa

70050000024231.name: Shin◆Bakumatsu Sinsengumi
70050000024231.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
- OKITA ＆ SAITO
- SAKAMOTO ＆ TAKASUGI
- Keisuke Otori
- Isami Kondo
- Toshizo Hijikata
- Souji Okita
- Hajime Saito
- Susumu Yamazaki
- Izo Okada
- Shin◆Bakumatsu Sinsengumi

70050000024308.name: Dead by Daylight: A BINDING OF KIN
70050000024308.description:
A Binding of Kin is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a unique Killer but 2 characters: The Twins (Charlotte & Victor), and a Survivor, Élodie Rakoto. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killers, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the Survivor: Elodie’s Sunset Crop. 

The new Killer comes as a pair: conjoined twins from 17th century France, Charlotte and Victor Deshayes formed an emotional bond like none other. After a life of hardship and suffering, The Entity has twisted their love for one another into something truly terrifying. The new Survivor is Élodie Rakoto. Cunning, smart, and resolute, Élodie Rakoto spent her life trying to uncover the mystery of her parents’ disappearance. Grief-stricken and guilt-ridden, Élodie turned to the occult to find the answers she was looking for.

70050000024574.name: No Mercy: Lin
70050000024574.description:
A new exercise intensity has been added. Now you can try it Low, High, or No Mercy.
The good-natured exercise instructor you know is showing her ruthless side, and she'll really put you through your paces now!

70050000024575.name: No Mercy: Evan
70050000024575.description:
A new exercise intensity has been added. Now you can try it Low, High, or No Mercy.
The good-natured exercise instructor you know is showing his ruthless side, and he'll really put you through your paces now!

70070000010486.name: West of Dead: Path of the Crow Deluxe Edition
70070000010486.intro: Walk the Path of the Crow
70070000010486.description:
The Path of the Crow Deluxe Edition contains: 

The Game.

The Crow familiar, a friend to our hero. The crow will stay by your side through the darkest of paths. 

A new level, The Battlefield. Dilapidated and riven with rot and decay, the land here has been shattered and burned by explosions, with a fog-filled with the calls to charge. This level is the epitome of all war and it is yours to battle through. 

A new enemy, The Captain, a truly frightening opponent, maddened by his lust for war. He is armed with a cannon and a sabre, this menace is trouble close or afar.

A new weapon, The Mortar, claimed from The Battlefield, this new weapon will terrify even those cowering behind cover.

A new blessing, Strength, with this, you'll be able to punch down steel doors and land a mean hook on the denizens in your way.

70070000010683.name: WWE 2K Battlegrounds Digital Deluxe Edition
70070000010683.description:
The world of WWE is your battleground with all-new, over the top, in-your-face arcade action as your favorite WWE Superstars and Legends battle it out in outlandish environments with an arsenal of moves, special abilities, and power-ups. Compete in your favorite match types including Steel Cage, Royal Rumble, Fatal Four Way and more, as Mauro Ranallo and Jerry “The King” Lawler call the mayhem!
Raise some hell with Stone Cold Steve Austin, lay the SmackDown with the Attitude Era version of The Rock and get rowdy with Ronda Rousey. The WWE 2K Battlegrounds Digital Deluxe Edition includes three versions of each Superstar along with the pre-order bonus, Edge. Also includes additional 1100 Golden Bucks to unlock additional WWE Superstars and legends.

70070000010702.name: Sniper Elite 4 Season Pass
70070000010702.description:
The Sniper Elite 4 Season Pass gives players access to all the game’s DLC packs for one great price.
 Including the infamous Target Führer campaign mission and a wealth of thrilling singleplayer and multiplayer content, the Sniper Elite 4 Season Pass delivers a compelling expansion whether you choose to brave the conflicts of WW2 Italy solo, or in co-op and competitive combat.

70070000010767.name: FAIRY TAIL Digital Deluxe
70070000010767.intro: A game based on the popular "FAIRY TAIL" is available on Nintendo Switch™ for the first time!
70070000010767.description:
■Play as powerful mages from different guilds
A total of 16 playable characters!
Various characters from guilds other than "Fairy Tail" appear!
Also, the game includes an original episode.

■Magic battles, Fairy Tail style
Familiar moves from the source material such as Unison Raid and Extreme Magic can be performed!
There are also Unison Raids that are original to the game.

■Aim to become the No. 1 guild
The town of Magnolia and inside of the guild are fully depicted.
Complete missions that appear on the request board, raise your guild's rank with your comrades, and aim to become the No. 1 guild!

[Content included in this product]
 - FAIRY TAIL game
 - DDX Only Lucy's Costume Gust Collaboration Ryza &
   Limited Edition Growth Lacrima x 5
 - Natsu's Costume "Fairy Tail Team A"
 - Lucy's Costume "Fairy Tail Team A"
 - Gray's Costume "Fairy Tail Team A"
 - Erza's Costume "Fairy Tail Team A"
 - Wendy's Costume "Fairy Tail Team A"

Note: All items included in the Digital Deluxe Edition may become available for purchase at a later date.

70070000010769.intro: The Special Swimsuit Costume Set for 16 Playable Characters adds 1 costume for each of the 16 characters.
70070000010769.description:
